Texas State University Center for Analytics and Data Science (TXST CADS) shared a post: 🚀 Join us this Friday! 🚀

The Department of Information Systems and Analytics at the McCoy College of Business, in collaboration with TXST CADS, invites you to an exciting talk:

📅 Date: Friday, October 25, 2024
🕚 Time: 11:00 AM – 12:00 PM
📍 Location: MCCOY 125
🔗 Zoom: email cads@txstate.edu for the link

Topic:
"Data-driven Considerations in Innovative Predictive Modeling from Noisy Tabular Data in Education and Healthcare"

Speaker:
👩‍🏫 Dr. Jelena Tešić, Associate Professor
Department of Computer Science, Texas State University

Don't miss this opportunity to explore how predictive modeling can unlock new insights from imperfect data, transforming decision-making in education and healthcare. Whether you're joining in person or online, this session promises to be engaging and impactful!

                              Ayush,

Subject: Achieve your professional and personal goals faster with LinkedIn Premium
⚡️ IBM Granite 3.0 8B Surpasses Llama 3.1 on OpenLLM Benchmark
Message:
On IBM, Perplexity, ElevenLabs, Meta, Genmo, Google and many more.. 

SIGNUP [1]  |  ADVERTISE [2]  |  FOLLOW ON X [3]  |  READ
ON WEB [4]

ALPHASIGNAL

 . 

HEY ,

Welcome to today's edition of AlphaSignal, a newsletter for developers
by developers.

We identify and summarize the top 1% news, papers, models, and repos
in the AI industry. 

IN TODAY'S SIGNAL

_Read time: 6 min 9 sec_

🎖️ TOP NEWS

 	*
IBM Releases Granite 3.0 [5]: New Open-Source LLM Family Optimized for
Enterprise Scale

📌 ORI

 	*
New GPU infrastructure: isolated private clusters, custom specs [6],
compliance support, and dedicated HPC expertise.

⚡️ TRENDING SIGNALS

 	*
Perplexity introduces Reasoning Mode [7] to enhance multi-layered
query processing for complex AI research.

 	*
ElevenLabs introduces text-to-voice generation system [8], enabling us
to create custom voices instantly.

 	*
Meta unveils self-contained LLM training framework [9] Lingua for
rapid research experimentation in PyTorch.

 	*
Genmo releases Mochi 1 [10], setting new SOTA benchmarks in
open-source video generation.

 	*
Google publishes about how they uses probabilistic reasoning [11]
framework to enhance LLM inference accuracy.

📌 LAMBDA

 	*
Deploy new on demand  1x, 2x, and 4x NVIDIA H100 SXM GPU [12]
instances with Lambda.

📦 TOP HF MODELS

 	*
Allegro [13]: open-source text-to-video model generates high-res
content with minimal GPU requirements.

 	*
stable-diffusion-3.5-large [14]: new stable diffusion update adds
better prompt control and edge deployment.

 	*
Llama-3.1-Nemotron-70B-Instruct-HF [15]: nvidia-tuned llama 3.1 model
leads performance charts with easy deployment.

🧠 PYTORCH TIP

 	*
Custom autograd functions: build your own differentiable Pytorch
operations

IF YOU'RE ENJOYING ALPHASIGNAL PLEASE FORWARD THIS EMAIL TO A
COLLEAGUE. 

It helps us keep this content free.

TOP NEWS

IBM

IBM RELEASES GRANITE 3.0: NEW OPEN-SOURCE LLM FAMILY OPTIMIZED FOR
ENTERPRISE SCALE

⇧ 3,486 Likes

WHAT'S NEW

IBM's Granite 3.0 introduces multiple language models ranging from 2B
to 8B parameters, released under Apache 2.0 license. The models
support 12 natural languages and 116 programming languages, trained on
12 trillion tokens using a novel two-stage approach.

KEY HIGHLIGHTS

 	*
Granite 3.0 8B scores 37.6 on OpenLLM Leaderboard, surpassing Llama
3.1 8B (37.3)

 	*
Achieves 3-23x cost reduction vs larger models in production tests

 	*
Delivers 2x latency improvement through speculative decoding

 	*
Processes enterprise tasks with <1B parameters using MoE architecture

 	*
Supports 128K context window (upcoming)

ARCHITECTURE AND TECHNICAL IMPLEMENTATION

 	*
Granite 3.0 8B achieves 37.6 score on OpenLLM Leaderboard,
outperforming Llama 3.1 8B (37.3) and similar-sized Mistral/Meta
models on RAG benchmarks.

 	*
MoE variants (3B-A800M) maintain performance while running with <1B
parameters at inference time, making them viable for CPU deployments.

 	*
Speculative decoding implementation delivers 2x improvement in both
latency and throughput for production workloads

ARCHITECTURE AND TECHNICAL IMPLEMENTATION

The core innovation lies in the Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) architecture,
enabling CPU-based deployments while maintaining performance. The
3B-A800M and 1B-A400M variants run efficiently with less than 1B
parameters at inference time. The models implement speculative
decoding for reduced latency and enhanced throughput in production
environments.

TRAINING AND OPTIMIZATION

The two-stage training method optimizes data quality through thousands
of experiments. The InstructLab alignment technique enables
fine-tuning with enterprise data, particularly effective for RAG,
classification, and code generation tasks. The training architecture
processes multiple programming languages through specialized token
optimization.

DEPLOYMENT AND INTEGRATION

The models deploy across multiple platforms including NVIDIA NIM,
Google Cloud Vertex AI, and Hugging Face. Enterprise deployments
benefit from IP indemnification through watsonx platform. The
architecture supports both edge computing and CPU-based
implementations, with specific optimizations for low-latency
applications.

TECHNICAL CAPABILITIES

The models excel in enterprise-specific tasks like Retrieval Augmented
Generation, tool use, and advanced reasoning. The architecture
supports multi-modal document understanding and implements efficient
token processing for extended context windows.

		 READ MORE [5] 

		 [6] 

FLEXIBLE AI INFRASTRUCTURE TO BUILD ANYTHING IMAGINABLE

Ori Private Cloud now delivers isolated GPU infrastructure for
specialized AI workloads at scale.

 	*
ZERO SHARED RESOURCES: Single-tenant infrastructure with complete
access control.

 	*
FULL GPU FLEXIBILITY: Scalable clusters that adapt to specific compute
needs.

 	*
GLOBAL COMPLIANCE READY: Built-in support for regulatory requirements
and certifications.

 	*
EXPERT HPC SUPPORT: Direct access to HPC specialists throughout
project lifecycle.

‍‍‍‌‍Contact the team for a free consultation and to set up
a private GPU cloud deployment.

		 LEARN MORE [6] 

_partner with us [16]_

TRENDING SIGNALS

Perplexity

PERPLEXITY INTRODUCES REASONING MODE TO ENHANCE MULTI-LAYERED QUERY
PROCESSING FOR COMPLEX AI RESEARCH [7]

⇧ 4,370 Likes

ElevenLabs 

ELEVENLABS INTRODUCES TEXT-TO-VOICE GENERATION SYSTEM, ENABLING US TO
CREATE CUSTOM VOICES INSTANTLY [8]

⇧ 1,600 Likes

Meta

META UNVEILS SELF-CONTAINED LLM TRAINING FRAMEWORK LINGUA FOR RAPID
RESEARCH EXPERIMENTATION IN PYTORCH [9]

⇧ 1,000 Likes

Video Generation

GENMO RELEASES MOCHI 1, SETTING NEW SOTA BENCHMARKS IN OPEN-SOURCE
VIDEO GENERATION [10]

⇧ 5,551 Likes

Google

GOOGLE PUBLISHES ABOUT HOW THEY USES PROBABILISTIC REASONING FRAMEWORK
TO ENHANCE LLM INFERENCE ACCURACY [11]

⇧ 305 Likes

NEW ON-DEMAND 1X, 2X, AND 4X NVIDIA H100 SXM GPU INSTANCES

Lambda just added new instances in their public cloud that deliver up
to 51% higher performance than PCIe models.

AI developers now have cheaper, flexible access to powerful compute
without needing full-node 8x setups.

SPIN UP AN INSTANCE [12]

TOP MODELS

Text to Video

ALLEGRO [13]

⇧49 Downloads

Helps you create 6-second, 720x1280 videos from text descriptions at
15 FPS. The open-source model combines a 175M VideoVAE and 2.8B
VideoDiT to generate diverse scenes, from close-ups to dynamic
content.

Text to Image

STABLE-DIFFUSION-3.5-LARGE [14]

⇧ 10,,991 Downloads

Stable Diffusion 3.5 helps you generate customizable AI images with
better prompt accuracy. The 8B parameter Large model delivers highest
quality, while Large Turbo offers faster generation. The 2.6B Medium
model runs on edge devices.

KEY TECHNICAL UPDATES

 	*
MMDiT-X architecture combines diffusion and transformer techniques for
multi-resolution generation.

 	*
Query-Key Normalization makes fine-tuning more stable.

 	*
Free for non-commercial use and commercial use under $1M revenue.

 	*
Available via API and Hugging Face.

 	*
ControlNets coming soon for spatial control and color preservation.

LLM

LLAMA-3.1-NEMOTRON-70B-INSTRUCT-HF [15]

⇧ 89,133 Downloads

You can now run Meta's largest language model directly from Hugging
Face. This 70B parameter model outperforms GPT-4-Turbo and Claude 3.5
on key benchmarks - scoring 85.0 on Arena Hard, 57.6 on AlpacaEval 2
LC, and 8.98 on MT-Bench.

KEY HIGHLIGHTS

 	*
Runs on 2+ 80GB GPUs with 150GB disk space.

 	*
Handles 128k input tokens, outputs 4k tokens max.

 	*
Built on Llama 3.1, fine-tuned with REINFORCE using HelpSteer2
dataset.

 	*
Works with standard HF transformers code, no special prompting needed.

 	*
Free hosted inference available through NVIDIA's API

PYTORCH TIP

CUSTOM AUTOGRAD FUNCTIONS: BUILD YOUR OWN DIFFERENTIABLE PYTORCH
OPERATIONS

An Autograd Function in PyTorch is a class that defines how to compute
custom forward and backward passes for a new operation, letting you
specify your own gradient computation rules. It's the building block
that lets you create new differentiable operations beyond PyTorch's
built-in ones.

You can define custom backward pass operations in PyTorch when the
built-in autograd isn't sufficient. This is useful for complex
gradient computations, custom optimization algorithms, or specialized
layer operations.

Here's a simple example that implements a custom ReLU with a tweaked
gradient:

import torch
from torch.autograd import Function

class CustomReLU(Function):
    @staticmethod
    def forward(ctx, input):
        ctx.save_for_backward(input)
        return input.clamp(min=0)

    @staticmethod
    def backward(ctx, grad_output):
        input, = ctx.saved_tensors
        grad_input = grad_output.clone()
        grad_input[input < 0] = 0.1
        # Modified gradient for negative values
        return grad_input

# Usage
x = torch.randn(5, requires_grad=True)
custom_relu = CustomReLU.apply
output = custom_relu(x)
output.sum().backward()
print("Input:", x)
print("Gradient:", x.grad)

This code creates a ReLU variant where negative inputs get a small
positive gradient (0.1) instead of zero. This helps prevent "dying
ReLU" problems in deep networks by allowing some gradient flow even
for negative inputs.

In the event, you will learn to build a data model in Power BI!

Everything in Power BI is more complicated if you don’t build a good data model. Business Intelligence consultants spend an entire career learning how to build data models, but NOT you! Understanding the fundamentals of dimensional modeling (Star Schema) can get you very far in Power BI.

What you’ll learn:

- ✅ What is a Star Schema?
- ✅ Building Facts and Dimensions
- ✅ Understanding Relationships
- ✅ Role-Playing tables
- ✅ Understanding Storage Modes
- ✅ Direct Lake with Fabric

Sign up now to claim your seat!

Learn With The Nerds

Data Modeling for Power BI [2024 Edition]

Thursday, October 24, 2024

11:00 AM - 2:00 PM Eastern Time (UTC -5)

Subject: 2025 Applications Now Open for Lakehead University
Message: Email from Lakehead University International Explore undergraduate and graduate programs and learn how to apply...   Apply Today We are now accepting applications for 2025 undergraduate and graduate programs Hello Ayush, Renowned for academic excellence and a nurturing student support network, Lakehead University offers over 85 diverse programs across several faculties, including Business Administration, Engineering, Science and Environmental Studies, Health and Behavioural Sciences, Education, Natural Resources Management, and Social Sciences and Humanities. Explore your academic program of interest and learn about Lakehead's admission requirements and applications, now open for all 2025 terms. Guide to Applying Programs Offered at Lakehead     Undergraduate Program Applications The September (Fall) 2025 intake is now open. UPCOMING APPLICATION DEADLINES Consecutive Education: December 1, 2024 Technological Education Diploma: December 1, 2024 Social Work (1-year): December 9, 2024 Nursing: January 15, 2025 All other programs: March 1, 2025 is the recommended deadline Apply Now (Undergraduate)     Graduate Program Applications The May (Spring) and September (Fall) 2025 applications are now open. Application deadlines vary by program. Please see individual program listings for details. Apply Now (Graduate)     Important Announcement from Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC): Graduate applicants who apply for their study permit after January 22, 2025 will now require a Provincial Attestation Letter (PAL) in order to apply for their study permit. We strongly encourage all graduate applicants who have a Letter of Acceptance before that date to apply immediately for their study permit. Undergraduate applicants with a Letter of Acceptance from Lakehead University will need a Provincial Attestation Letter (PAL) in order to apply for their study permit. We will email all offer holders the next steps to requesting a PAL. We're Here to Help Book a 1-on-1 appointment with a Lakehead expert to ask your questions. Book an Appointment             Lakehead University - International Enrolment | 955 Oliver Road | Thunder Bay, ON P7B 5E1 CA Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

Subject: 24 Hour Reminder ⏰ - Applying for your Student Visa Webinar
Message: Email from Lakehead University International Save your seat at our upcoming live webinar and learn about applying for a Canadian study permit and visa   Hi Ayush! We're less than 24 hours away from our live Applying for your Student Visa webinar! Learn more or save your spot by registering below.     Applying for your Student Visa Friday, October 25, 2024 10:00 - 11:00 AM in Eastern Time (Canada) (view in your time zone)﻿   Learn More & Register   When studying in one of Lakehead’s degree programs for more than 6 months, you will require a Canadian study permit. If you've received a Letter of Acceptance, it's now time to consider your next steps and learn how to apply for your study permit and visa. During this live webinar, you will learn about the process and requirements, and our advisors will offer guidance on applying for a Canadian study permit. Our Regulated International Student Immigration Advisors (RISIA), certified by ICCRC (Immigration Consultants of Canada Regulatory Council) are here to help you with all immigration matters during your studies at Lakehead. You'll also have the opportunity to ask your questions live. Register today!     Looking forward to connecting with you Jordan Ball International New & Social Media Officer Lakehead University - International Enrolment   Explore Lakehead's 85+ undergraduate and graduate programs Visit our Website             Lakehead University - International Enrolment | 955 Oliver Road | Thunder Bay, ON P7B 5E1 CA Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

Subject: 24 Hour Reminder ⏰ - Admissions & Applications Webinar
Message: Email from Lakehead University International Save your seat at our upcoming live admissions webinar and learn about Lakehead University   Hi Ayush! We're less than 24 hours away from our live Admissions & Applications webinar! Learn more or save your spot by registering below.     Admissions & Applications Thursday, October 24, 2024 9:00 - 10:00 AM in Eastern Time (Canada) (view in your time zone)﻿   Learn More & Register   As you consider applying to Lakehead University, we want to make sure you are making an informed decision and understand the process to apply online. Learn about general admission requirements, program-specific prerequisites, required documentation, and application deadlines in this webinar. We'll also navigate Lakehead’s online application portals for both undergraduate and graduate programs, and will introduce you to the wide variety of English language courses offered at Lakehead to help you meet your educational, professional, and personal goals. Our recruitment team will be leading the presentation and hosting a live question & answer period. Register today! Register today!     Looking forward to connecting with you Jordan Ball International New & Social Media Officer Lakehead University - International Enrolment   Explore Lakehead's 85+ undergraduate and graduate programs Visit our Website             Lakehead University - International Enrolment | 955 Oliver Road | Thunder Bay, ON P7B 5E1 CA Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

From: University of Louisville - College of Business <communication@partners.qs.com>
Subject: Transform Your Future with UofL’s STEM-Designated MS in Business Analytics
Message:
Discover how UofL's STEM-designated MS in Business Analytics can fast-track your career in the USA

Transform Your Future with a STEM-Designated Business Analytics Degree

Are you ready to stand out in the global marketplace? The University of Louisville’s College of Business offers a cutting-edge, STEM-designated one-year Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) (https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VWrl6F4vWC-RW4kTspj8VKk_MW8ZpTlp5mvQ93N8_nRGx3prCCW7Y8-PT6lZ3mJW6QL8-_2xf5qjN4d05zfTVLmBW5kD9Qd2qNTMSW6SZMSZ2bkNQdVWMkPd8WJMscW39Ylch6SNLXHW2SgtZ-3N6hLkN58qKgghhlZkW1--19T2S7l8-W4TZDD08ypzsvW1Lyjh17-DpdhW3KSbTx8nlFD9W8lRxfK5hvvP9W3HrmhT2q2kh4N48Vyr_DkwFFVj-d3S5xmMZJW2DnSKZ7K2ktLN8qHWyLgHmStW5Gqmv51lw5PDW1XdH792GWskRW8w7X8Y7k3LrlW8G_w4733tjXLW5Rh4MD49T2qCW90JBPn5yz6plW48mSx36qswkGN38wj9XlSxmXf7b9Bl004 ) crafted for real-world application:

🚀 No GMAT Required: Focus on your future, not a test score

💼 Paid Internships: Competitive, paid internships with our business partners

🎓 Merit-Based Scholarships: up to 10-15% in tuition discounts

Upon graduation, your resume will showcase both advanced skills and practical experience. Plus, as a STEM graduate, you’re eligible for up to three years of post-completion work authorization in the USA (STEM OPT) —a powerful advantage that ensures your return on investment is immediate and substantial.

Elevate Your Career with an MS in Business Analytics

Whether your background is in technology, business, or even the arts, this program is designed to help you harness the power of big data to tell compelling stories that drive business success. With a cutting-edge concentration in AI, you’ll graduate with the confidence and skills needed for tomorrow’s jobs.

Want to Know More?

Join our Virtual Info Session on November 6th at 8:30 PM IST to learn how the UofL MSBA can fast-track your success: Register here (https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VWrl6F4vWC-RW4kTspj8VKk_MW8ZpTlp5mvQ93N8_nRH63prCCW95jsWP6lZ3p3W1w92lk7zKK_zW5SJmrk2NWSZMVkB2FD8zQvfCW5M-cCP2vTFJ_W47pXj4846p8DW6G4PCp88pVhCW1pKVRH1XQ1GpW12vBk15gpMQvW2hcB3h3tk9ccW8zknDj3vzPh6N1wbNn8LvyR0W6xC-xp5QDR0bW37ZwRT4H_9QsW2XxKC_2HYWDBW2qpMqD1pKyR_W99tVc84MBg7rW7jF20785JGLKW7pgrYz9lg07DVp6Fxh3tXsLkW6y9fhm3tTjjCW5Hrl6X4b-2MxW6Q84M-8TQMhpN57qRyqRgMY7N3k1HS18dP-QVxW15c5F70rlW5cM-f88tvwMBW3K_FY78FqgVXW1Kzg1y7XXxhwW4RyqDS2kVSrGW3VyKgT1GhwQNf9hlpfg04 ) .

Hear from our Students

Meet Sakthiraj Kandasamy, originally from Tamil Nadu, India. Sakthiraj is not only a Senior Application and Data Analyst at Fiserv, a global leader in financial services technology, but also the Co-President of the MSBA program at the University of Louisville. Balancing a demanding full-time job with the rigorous MS in Business Analytics curriculum, Sakthiraj exemplifies how far passion and discipline can take you.

So, what makes the Master of Science in Business Analytics (MSBA) (https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VWrl6F4vWC-RW4kTspj8VKk_MW8ZpTlp5mvQ93N8_nRGx3prCCW7Y8-PT6lZ3mJW6QL8-_2xf5qjN4d05zfTVLmBW5kD9Qd2qNTMSW6SZMSZ2bkNQdVWMkPd8WJMscW39Ylch6SNLXHW2SgtZ-3N6hLkN58qKgghhlZkW1--19T2S7l8-W4TZDD08ypzsvW1Lyjh17-DpdhW3KSbTx8nlFD9W8lRxfK5hvvP9W3HrmhT2q2kh4N48Vyr_DkwFFVj-d3S5xmMZJW2DnSKZ7K2ktLN8qHWyLgHmStW5Gqmv51lw5PDW1XdH792GWskRW8w7X8Y7k3LrlW8G_w4733tjXLW5Rh4MD49T2qCW90JBPn5yz6plW48mSx36qswkGN38wj9XlSxmXf7b9Bl004 ) program special for someone like Sakthiraj? "The flexibility of the program, with its evening classes, allows me to pursue my professional goals without compromising on my career," he says. Despite balancing a demanding full-time job, Sakthiraj is thriving in a rigorous curriculum that provides real-world application from day one. “Every concept I’ve learned in the MSBA program has been directly applicable to my role at Fiserv,” he explains.

With a focus on advanced analytics and AI, Sakthiraj's journey demonstrates the career-boosting impact that a graduate degree can offer. "The MSBA program is designed for professionals like me—driven, ambitious, and seeking to elevate their careers in an increasingly data-driven world," he adds.

Let’s Connect!

Have questions? Want a one-on-one conversation with our admissions team? Schedule a virtual appointment at your convenience: Schedule here (https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VWrl6F4vWC-RW4kTspj8VKk_MW8ZpTlp5mvQ93N8_nRGR3prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3nbW3FWYTg6mnZPWW8_Dzh14Nrl3HW2t14Q02wvTb7W1VKhmG3ttHPlV8wGlg719zCnW7ff1hm86rKDBVg5m7D79YG-MW3T4Rv352lvqgW1txjdR7H0JXtW7Qx9qK4wwv6JW3qJS_l3hfZGHW8sx9Dl6tWCkWW2-jLs41wdvvDW65_7zZ77fMWzW3kk5lq65jhhcW86tnZT5XCS0sW1ZsCFY9lf3w1W6DwpLy2Swt4tW8dt3141nWjrtW1sb3N-8NGh1PW88tGXQ9kzg30N8jJpfJfH80sN7j_cjHHMzYxN72nthJlRMX4N7JpkT5NhWvjW74MT0X92TFDSW4NdFmd4vDnMpVsG8cb6ZRjbxf44-q3K04 )

The future of business is data. Will you lead the way?

Don’t Wait – Your Future Starts Now
(https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VWrl6F4vWC-RW4kTspj8VKk_MW8ZpTlp5mvQ93N8_nRGR3prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3nbW3FWYTg6mnZPWW8_Dzh14Nrl3HW2t14Q02wvTb7W1VKhmG3ttHPlV8wGlg719zCnW7ff1hm86rKDBVg5m7D79YG-MW3T4Rv352lvqgW1txjdR7H0JXtW7Qx9qK4wwv6JW3qJS_l3hfZGHW8sx9Dl6tWCkWW2-jLs41wdvvDW65_7zZ77fMWzW3kk5lq65jhhcW86tnZT5XCS0sW1ZsCFY9lf3w1W6DwpLy2Swt4tW8dt3141nWjrtW1sb3N-8NGh1PW88tGXQ9kzg30N8jJpfJfH80sN7j_cjHHMzYxN72nthJlRMX4N7JpkT5NhWvjW74MT0X92TFDSW4NdFmd4vDnMpVsG8cb6ZRjbxf44-q3K04 )

Subject: Recruiter from Expedia Group just sent you a message on WayUp
Message:
Hi Ayush,
I’m a recruiter for EXPEDIA GROUP. EXPEDIA GROUP powers travel for
everyone, everywhere through our global platform. I saw your profile on
WayUp, and it looks like you could be a great fit for our MACHINE
LEARNING SCIENTIST INTERNSHIP - MASTERS - 2025 in Seattle, WA.

The MACHINE LEARNING SCIENTIST INTERNSHIP may include:

-   Applying statistics methods like confidence intervals, point
    estimates and sample size estimates to make sound and confident
    inferences on data and A/B tests
-   Applying Natural Language models to Google keyword analysis and
    applying meta models to our multi-objective ranking problem
-   Communicating complex analytical topics in a clean & simple way to
    multiple partners and senior leadership (both internal & external) 
-   Conducting feature engineering and modifying existing
    models/techniques to suit business needs
-   Developing domain expertise in fraud & risk to understand how to
    detect risky transactions
-   Modeling rich and complex online travel data to understand, predict
    and optimize business metrics to help improve the traveler
    experience 
-   Framing business problems as data science problems with a concrete
    set of tasks 

Interested? Apply here:
 http://email.messages.wayup.com/c/eJxEzs1OxCAUQOGnoTsauAx_CxYurDFxVvME13I7RVvaALXO25sYE9fnLL4YLGgvbUdBWvBGC6WgmwMYL6XDyUZ6p8kCWhvdJA040khadSmAgIsUoASAVtBP4ABGYaJy0SBKdhEr1Yp3qv2Jj2Pvx23tljC3tlemnhgMDIbzPP8rgyHx19yoZGr8g19xnFMm_kZYcsp3fhsT5ZZq-7v4FWujUjkI0PxG2NpC_Pl7p5iQv5Tt2LlUxlswVnivtRAMhq4EfBx17vftc8ZCi2MXcV8xLb_ErwA_AQAA__9vl1Xn

Looking forward to reviewing your resume!  

Best,

Dear Ayush,

Thank you for your interest in Nintendo! We received your application for 240000009X Intern - IT Software Engineer and require an additional final step. 


Please complete the Internship Questionnaire immediately following to finalize your application submission. We review all final application submissions on a rolling basis and if selected, we will reach out for a phone interview. TOP NEWS

Anthropic

ANTHROPIC INTRODUCES COMPUTER USE CAPABILITY WITH NEW CLAUDE 3.5
MODELS

⇧ 17,486 Likes

WHAT'S NEW

Anthropic released an upgraded Claude 3.5 Sonnet and announced Claude
3.5 Haiku, introducing computer use capability in public beta.
Developers can now direct Claude to use computers the way people
do—by looking at a screen, moving a cursor, clicking, and typing
text.

KEY TECHNICAL HIGHLIGHTS

 	*
Computer use API enables screen viewing, cursor movement, clicking,
and typing

 	*
Translates natural language to computer commands

 	*
Available on Anthropic API, Amazon Bedrock, and Google Cloud Vertex AI

 	*
Supports multi-step task automation and UI navigation

 	*
Processes visual UI elements for direct computer interaction

PERFORMANCE METRICS

 	*
Claude 3.5 Haiku matches Claude 3 Opus's performance metrics while
maintaining lower computational requirements. It achieves 40.6% on
SWEbench Verified, surpassing both the original Claude 3.5 Sonnet and
GPT-4o.

 	*
The upgraded Claude 3.5 Sonnet demonstrates significant improvements
in benchmark performance:

 	*
SWEbench Verified: 49.0% (up from 33.4%)

 	*
OSWorld screenshot-only: 14.9% (next best AI system: 7.8%)

 	*
OSWorld with extended steps: 22.0%

COMPUTER USE ARCHITECTURE

The system processes visual information from computer screens and
converts natural language instructions into executable commands. It
allows Claude to control your computer screen based on a prompt and
take actions on your behalf. 

It works by:

 	*
Viewing and interpreting screenshots of computer screen

 	*
Takes static screenshots that are constantly sent back to the API in
real-time

 	*
Then Claude can move your cursor, click, and type text. 

 	*
That is Claude executes the mouse clicks based on pixel calculations

 	*
Claude 3.5 Sonnet is now the first ever frontier model to offer a
feature like 'Computer Use' to the public.

It handles complex workflows by breaking them into discrete steps:
screen analysis, element identification, and action execution. Current
limitations exist in continuous actions like scrolling, dragging, and
zooming.

REAL-WORLD IMPLEMENTATION

Companies including Replit, Asana, and DoorDash have integrated the
computer use capability. Replit employs it for real-time app
evaluation during development. The API supports automation of
repetitive processes, software testing, and research tasks requiring
multiple interface interactions.

HIGH-SPEED LLM INFERENCE WITH CEREBRAS: A LLAMAINDEX INTEGRATION GUIDE

⇧ 185 Likes

In this blog you will learn to integrate Cerebras Systems with
LlamaIndex that delivers 1800 tokens/second throughput with Llama
3.1-8b model.

Their Wafer-Scale Engine-3 (WSE-3) processor runs the larger Llama
3.1-70b at 450 tokens/second. You can deploy these models through
Cerebras Cloud API or on-premise installations.

The integration works with Python and requires minimal setup - just
pip install and an API key.

YOU'LL LEARN

 	*
Setting up Cerebras with LlamaIndex

 	*
Running chat completions with WSE-3

 	*
Implementing streaming responses

 	*
Configuring system prompts

 	*
Managing API authentication

 	*
Scaling across model sizes (8b to 70b)

Subject: Register for our 5-Day Gen AI Intensive Course (Nov 11-15) with Google
Message:
Kaggle








Hi ayush pokharel,

We're hosting a Gen AI intensive course with Google on November 11 - 15th  
and would love for you to join!

This no-cost course was created by a team of Google ML researchers and  
engineers and designed to help you better understand some of the  
fundamental technologies and techniques behind Generative AI.





Register for the Course



Everyday, participants will receive the following in their inbox:


📚 Daily Assignments
This includes newly published white papers, a companion podcast (generated  
by NotebookLM), and companion code labs in AI Studio.
💬 Discord Discussion Threads
Kaggle's Discord server will have a dedicated channel for focused  
discussion on the reading. It's an excellent place to find further  
clarification, surface any questions, and connect with other learners.
🎥 Daily Livestream Seminars and AMAs
We're going live everyday on Kaggle's YouTube channel, where the authors  
and course contributors will dive deeper into the topics and answer your  
burning questions. Plus, we've got fun surprises in store to keep the  
learning engaging.


For more information, visit the event website. Hope to see you there!

The Kaggle Team



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com because you indicated that  
you'd like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want to  
receive these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can also  
change your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in at  
kaggle.com.

Subject: Uber Reduces Database Lock Time by 94% with Major MySQL Fleet Upgrade
Message:
View this post on the web at https://blog.bytebytego.com/p/uber-reduces-database-lock-time-by

The Future of AI, LLMs, and Observability on Google Cloud (Sponsored) [ https://substack.com/redirect/b5a0ec89-e6fe-4533-a0e2-59920ca4075f?j=eyJ1IjoiNGttZjFjIn0.gcsUzE5NXaGUueZCDXoZj_4qIXulgaasToHhJaZqz5Y ]
Discover 7 key insights for technical leaders from Google’s Director of AI, Dr. Ali Arsanjani, and Datadog’s VP of Engineering, Sajid Mehmood. This ebook provides actionable insights around questions such as:
How can organizations better approach AI and LLMs?
How can you build customer confidence in the output of LLMs and LLM-based applications?
How should you evolve your tooling as your maturity with LLMs grows?
Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from the Uber Engineering Blog. All credit for the technical details goes to the Uber engineering team. The links to the original articles are present in the references section at the end of the post. We’ve attempted to analyze the details and provide our input about them. If you find any inaccuracies or omissions, please leave a comment, and we will do our best to fix them.
MySQL serves as the backbone for Uber’s vast and complex operations. For many years, Uber relied upon MySQL version 5.7 to support business-critical features.
However, in 2023, they decided to upgrade from MySQL version 5.7 to version 8.
In this post, we’ll look at the need for this and the challenges Uber faced in such a large-scale upgrade. We will also investigate the solutions Uber used to achieve the upgrade without violating the Service-Level Objective (SLO).
The Need for the Upgrade
The decision to upgrade Uber's MySQL infrastructure from version 5.7 to 8.0 was driven by several critical factors. 
First, MySQL 5.7 was reaching its end-of-life, meaning it would no longer receive security updates or bug fixes, leaving Uber's infrastructure vulnerable to potential security risks and operational instability. Upgrading to MySQL 8.0 mitigated these risks by ensuring ongoing support and security improvements. 
Additionally, MySQL 8.0 offered significant performance and concurrency enhancements such as:
Improved indexing and resource utilization: This led to faster query execution and better concurrency handling, crucial for Uber’s high-traffic operations.
Enhanced performance: These optimizations reduced latency and improved the overall user experience by supporting smoother transaction processing.
Beyond performance, MySQL 8.0 introduced several new functionalities such as:
Window functions and enhanced JSON handling: These improvements allowed more efficient data querying and manipulation.
Improved spatial data capabilities: This enabled more advanced processing of geographic data which is important for location-based services.
"Dual passwords" for smoother password rotations: This feature allowed Uber to rotate passwords during security incidents without causing service disruptions, enhancing security protocols.
Instant ADD Column functionality: This feature allowed schema changes to be made with minimal downtime, streamlining Uber's database management and ensuring high service availability.
Overall, these performance, security, and operational benefits made the transition to MySQL 8.0 a critical move for Uber's data infrastructure.
Workshop: Implementing Clean Architecture in Next.js (Sponsored) [ https://substack.com/redirect/92228fc8-4b93-461c-884c-fe36a622a287?j=eyJ1IjoiNGttZjFjIn0.gcsUzE5NXaGUueZCDXoZj_4qIXulgaasToHhJaZqz5Y ]
Lazar Nikolov and Sarah Guthals are hosting a free workshop on Implementing Clean Architecture in Next.js. It will dive deep into what clean architecture *actually* is, what problems it solves, and how to implement it in a Next.js application with Sentry.
The Scale of The Upgrade
Uber’s MySQL infrastructure is vast, operating at a scale that supports its global platform operations. Here are some stats about the overall scale that shows the critical role of MySQL in Uber’s services:
The system is composed of over 2,100 MySQL clusters.
The clusters are spread across 19 production zones in different regions. 
More than 16,000 nodes manage the massive volumes of data. 
These clusters handle petabytes of data and serve around 3 million queries per second.
Also, to ensure high availability and data redundancy, Uber employs a primary-secondary replication architecture. It works as follows:
Primary node: Responsible for handling all write traffic in each cluster.
Secondary nodes: Replicate the data asynchronously from the primary node, ensuring redundancy and fault tolerance. These secondary nodes are distributed across multiple data centers to enhance data availability and support seamless failover in case of primary node failure.
Challenges with the Upgrade
Several challenges had to be addressed during the upgrade of Uber’s MySQL fleet from version 5.7 to 8.0. Some of the major ones are as follows:
Manual upgrades were not possible due to the sheer scale of Uber’s MySQL infrastructure. It was important to have a detailed upgrade strategy that could be executed efficiently across diverse environments.
Uber’s platform operates globally, meaning that downtime could significantly impact services. Maintaining SLOs throughout the upgrade was crucial.
It was important to ensure compatibility with Uber’s existing applications and services. Since upgrading from MySQL 5.7 to 8.0 introduced new features and syntax changes that could potentially break existing queries, extensive testing was needed.
Uber conducted thorough regression checks and validation tests to ensure all existing systems and applications continued to work seamlessly with the upgraded database. 
This process included testing in a staging environment before making production upgrades. By validating every aspect of the system, Uber was able to mitigate the risk of any unexpected issues after the upgrade.
Finally, Uber implemented automated rollback mechanisms to safeguard the upgrade process. 
In the event of any failures or compatibility issues during the upgrade, these mechanisms could automatically revert the changes, ensuring the maintenance of service continuity and data integrity.
For instance, in the pre-maintenance stage, where the new MySQL 8.0 nodes operated as replicas, if performance issues or system degradation were detected, Uber could instantly roll back to MySQL 5.7 without any risk of data loss. The rollback capability was crucial for addressing any latency, resource consumption, or service degradation issues, allowing Uber to revert to a stable state until the issues were resolved. 
However, once a MySQL 8.0 node was promoted to the primary status, rolling back to MySQL 5.7 became more complex because replication between the new and old versions was no longer possible. In other words, Uber had to ensure everything was functioning correctly before promoting the new nodes to avoid irreversible complications.
Upgrade Strategy
When upgrading its massive MySQL infrastructure from version 5.7 to 8.0, Uber had two possible strategies to choose from: side-by-side upgrade and in-place upgrade.
In-Place Upgrade
An in-place upgrade involves directly upgrading the existing MySQL installation to the new version (MySQL 8.0) on the same nodes. 
The process typically requires stopping the MySQL service, upgrading the software, and restarting it. While this method can be simpler in terms of setup, it also comes with significant drawbacks:
Extended downtime: Since the MySQL service must be stopped during the upgrade, this approach leads to a noticeable period of downtime. For a global platform like Uber, even a brief service interruption can have a major impact.
Limited rollback: If issues arise after the upgrade, rolling back to the previous version can be difficult. In-place upgrades provide less flexibility in case of failure, making it harder to revert to a stable state.
Risk of data loss or degradation: Any problems encountered during the in-place upgrade might lead to data loss or degradation of system performance, with fewer opportunities to recover without downtime.
Due to these limitations, Uber decided against the in-place upgrade method.
Side-by-Side Upgrade
Uber chose a side-by-side upgrade approach, which allowed for a smoother and less risky transition. 
See the diagram below:
In this method, the new MySQL 8.0 nodes were set up and operated alongside the existing MySQL 5.7 nodes. 
This approach was more suitable for Uber’s infrastructure due to the following reasons:
Minimal downtime: With the side-by-side method, the old MySQL 5.7 nodes remained operational while the new MySQL 8.0 nodes were being deployed. This allowed Uber to gradually transfer traffic from the old nodes to the new ones, avoiding significant service disruptions.
Easier rollback: If any issues occurred with the new MySQL 8.0 nodes, Uber could easily revert to the old MySQL 5.7 nodes. Since the old nodes were still running, the rollback process was simple and risk-free, reducing the chance of data loss or service degradation.
Thorough testing: Running the two versions side-by-side allowed Uber to fully test the new MySQL 8.0 nodes with real production traffic before completing the migration. This ensured that problems were detected and addressed before fully switching to the new version.
Scaling the Upgrade Process with Automation
To manage the complexity of upgrading such a large infrastructure, Uber implemented an automated workflow. 
With more than 2,100 clusters and over 16,000 nodes, upgrading each node manually was an impossible task. Automation ensured that the process was scalable, efficient, and free from human error.
Two main aspects of this automation are:
Monitoring and alerts: The system was designed to automatically monitor each stage of the upgrade, notifying the engineering team if any problems occurred. This allowed Uber to handle the upgrade across thousands of nodes without risking service stability.
Risk mitigation: The automated workflows minimized the risk of human error and allowed for quick intervention if any issues were detected during the upgrade process.
Four-Stage Upgrade Process for MySQL
Uber’s MySQL upgrade from version 5.7 to 8.0 was carefully planned and executed in a four-stage process. 
This approach ensured minimal service disruption and allowed Uber to transition its massive data infrastructure safely. Let’s break down the four stages in simple terms:
1. Pre-Maintenance Stage
In the pre-maintenance stage, new MySQL 8.0 nodes were added as replicas to the existing MySQL 5.7 clusters. A "node" here is a server running a MySQL instance. 
By adding these MySQL 8.0 nodes as replicas, they could work alongside the old 5.7 nodes without disrupting any operations.
This setup ensured that the old system (MySQL 5.7) continued functioning normally while the new system (MySQL 8.0) was being integrated, allowing Uber to keep everything running smoothly.
2. System Monitoring (Soak Period)
After setting up the MySQL 8.0 nodes, Uber entered the system monitoring stage, also known as the "soak period." This stage lasted for about a week and was crucial for testing the new system under real-world conditions.
During this time, Uber monitored the MySQL 8.0 nodes as they handled real production traffic (read operations), checking for issues such as slow performance, errors, or increased resource usage.
This period was essential to detect potential problems before making the final switch to MySQL 8.0.
3. Maintenance Stage
Once the soak period confirmed that everything was working smoothly, Uber moved to the maintenance stage. 
In this phase, the MySQL 8.0 node was promoted to primary status, meaning it now handled all write operations and became the main database for that cluster.
This promotion marked the point where MySQL 8.0 officially became the main database, while the MySQL 5.7 nodes were demoted or turned off for write traffic.
4. Post-Maintenance Stage
Finally, in the post-maintenance stage, Uber removed all the old MySQL 5.7 nodes that were no longer needed. 
At this point, the new MySQL 8.0 nodes were fully operational, and all traffic (both read and write) was being handled by the new system.
By completing this step, Uber successfully transitioned to the new version, ensuring that the system was upgraded without any data loss or significant service disruptions.
Issues During Upgrade
During the upgrade of Uber’s MySQL infrastructure to version 8.0, several issues were encountered that required careful handling and technical solutions to ensure the system continued to run smoothly. 
Here’s a breakdown of the key problems and how they were addressed:
Query Execution Plan Changes
One of the major issues that Uber faced was related to changes in the query execution plans in MySQL 8.0. 
A query execution plan is the path the database system uses to retrieve data. In some clusters, MySQL 8.0 chose different paths compared to version 5.7, leading to increased latencies (delays) and higher resource consumption.
These changes could slow down certain operations, affecting the performance of dashboards and other tools that relied on quick access to data. For instance, clusters powering key dashboards at Uber experienced noticeable slowdowns.
Uber worked with Percona, a database consulting company, to develop a patch that optimized the execution plans for the affected clusters. By applying this patch, Uber was able to restore performance and reduce resource consumption, bringing the system back to optimal operation.
Unsupported Queries and Configurations
MySQL 8.0 introduced new syntax rules and stricter configurations, which caused some queries that worked in MySQL 5.7 to fail after the upgrade. 
Specifically, some clusters didn’t have the STRICT_TRANS_TABLES SQL mode enabled, which is a default setting in MySQL 8.0. This mode enforces stricter rules on handling invalid or missing data.
Uber had to carefully adjust configurations and rewrite certain queries to align with MySQL 8.0’s new syntax and rules. For example, they enabled the STRICT_TRANS_TABLES and ONLY_FULL_GROUP_BY modes, which made the system more robust but required changes to some of the legacy queries and applications.
Collation and Character Set Changes
MySQL 8.0 also brought changes to the default character set and collation. The character set controls how text is stored, and the collation determines how text is compared. 
In MySQL 5.7, Uber had been using the utf8mb4_unicode_520_ci collation, but MySQL 8.0 switched to the new utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci collation. 
This change in the default character set and collation caused issues with sorting and comparing text data across different clusters, particularly when dealing with different languages or special characters. The system needed consistency in collation settings to function correctly, but this shift created mismatches.
Uber had to align the collation settings across its systems to ensure all nodes used the same character set and collation. This required detailed configuration changes and testing to ensure compatibility and proper sorting behavior across all clusters.
Client Library Incompatibility
Many client libraries that Uber used to connect to the MySQL database were not initially compatible with MySQL 8.0. Client libraries are essential for applications to communicate with the database, and outdated versions of these libraries did not support some of the new features and functions introduced in MySQL 8.0.
Without updating these libraries, Uber’s applications couldn’t fully utilize the benefits of MySQL 8.0, and some applications experienced failures or errors when trying to connect to the upgraded database.
Uber upgraded these client libraries across its systems. This process involved rigorous testing in a staging environment to ensure that all client libraries worked properly with MySQL 8.0 before the full upgrade. Once the testing was complete, the libraries were deployed in production, ensuring a smooth transition.
Improvements After The Upgrade
The upgrade to MySQL 8.0 brought significant performance improvements to Uber’s infrastructure, both on the server side and client side.
Let’s look at both.
Server-Side Performance:
29% improvement in p99 latency for inserts: At high concurrency levels (i.e., when many operations were happening simultaneously), the latency for insert operations improved by 29%, allowing Uber to handle more data input efficiently.
33% improvement in read latency: Queries that required reading data from the database saw a 33% reduction in latency, meaning data retrieval became much faster.
47% improvement in update latency: Similarly, update operations were executed 47% faster, enhancing the overall responsiveness of the system under heavy loads.
Client-Side Performance:
94% reduction in database lock time: The upgrade dramatically reduced the time the system spent waiting for locks on database resources, leading to more efficient transaction processing.
78% reduction in query time for certain queries: Some queries saw a significant 78% reduction in execution time, allowing Uber’s applications to run more smoothly and respond quicker to user requests.
Conclusion
Through careful planning, automation, and a phased rollout strategy, Uber successfully transitioned its vast data systems with minimal downtime and disruption. 
The new version brought significant benefits in terms of performance, security, and functionality, helping Uber improve its operational efficiency and user experience.
Some key learnings are as follows:
Automation is Critical: Given the scale of Uber’s MySQL infrastructure, automating the upgrade process was essential to reduce human error and ensure efficiency.
Thorough Testing: Extensive testing, including regression checks and system validation, was necessary to identify and resolve issues before the full production rollout, ensuring that existing applications remained compatible.
Rollback Mechanisms: Building automated rollback mechanisms proved vital to maintain service continuity and prevent data loss in case of unexpected issues during the upgrade.
Collaboration: Working with partners like Percona helped Uber quickly resolve specific issues, such as query execution plan changes and performance bottlenecks.
References:
Upgrading Uber’s MySQL Fleet to Version 8.0 [ https://substack.com/redirect/cc29c5f0-2f3f-4b4b-81f8-164cce9675e4?j=eyJ1IjoiNGttZjFjIn0.gcsUzE5NXaGUueZCDXoZj_4qIXulgaasToHhJaZqz5Y ]
MySQL 8 New Features [ https://substack.com/redirect/348b5ff8-50d0-4049-bb24-f95438fd51c3?j=eyJ1IjoiNGttZjFjIn0.gcsUzE5NXaGUueZCDXoZj_4qIXulgaasToHhJaZqz5Y ]
Why Uber Engineering switched from Postgres to MySQL [ https://substack.com/redirect/6701aaa0-dc88-48fe-a953-48ff6a217616?j=eyJ1IjoiNGttZjFjIn0.gcsUzE5NXaGUueZCDXoZj_4qIXulgaasToHhJaZqz5Y ]

Satyanarayan Parajuli shared a post: A Question That's Been Racing Through My Mind for an Entire Week

"Why is the Australian cricket team the most successful?"

Our 7-member team poured our hearts into a project, each contributing unique strengths. Just before the big presentation, one of us fell ill with dengue, leaving us with only 6. We had to quickly adapt and share the workload, ensuring that every piece of our project shone.When the moment arrived, we delivered a presentation that felt electric, and the excitement in the room was palpable. Everyone was convinced we had it in the bag, yet we finished as runners-up.Afterward, our professor praised our effort but posed a thought-provoking question:
 “Why is the Australian cricket team so successful?”

In your opinion, what underlying message does this question convey about?
Eagerly to know!!!

Texas State University Center for Analytics and Data Science (TXST CADS) shared a post: We had a fantastic time on Friday at the second session of the CADS Fall 2024 ExpandAI Catalyst Seminar Series on AI, Climate and Resilience!

A big thank you to Dr. Soe Win Myint and Dr. Eunsang Cho for their insightful presentations, and to everyone who attended and contributed to the engaging discussions. Your energy and ideas made this event truly special!

Subject: ⚡️ BitNet 1-Bit LLM: Microsoft releases the code for 5x faster on-device AI
Message:
On Microsoft, Anthropic, OpenAI, Meta and many more.. 

SIGNUP [1]  |  ADVERTISE [2]  |  FOLLOW ON X [3]  |  READ
ON WEB [4]

ALPHASIGNAL

 . 

HEY ,

Welcome to today's edition of AlphaSignal, a newsletter for developers
by developers.

We identify and summarize the top 1% news, papers, models, and repos
in the AI industry. 

IN TODAY'S SIGNAL

_Read time: 6 min 14 sec_

🎖️ TOP NEWS

 	*
"1-Bit LLM" Paper's Code Is Open-Sourced [5], Enabling LLMs On Local
Devices With 1.58-Bit Quantization.

📌 ENCORD

 	*
Upgrade your data curation pipelines [6] with Encord’s visual AI
data engine. Boost labeling speed 10x. Improve mAP 20% with less
data.

⚡️ TRENDING SIGNALS

 	*
Microsoft introduces autonomous AI agents [7] in Copilot Studio,
enabling developers to create custom, context-aware assistants.

 	*
Anthropic unveils sabotage evaluations for frontier AI models [8],
open-sourcing tests for future risks.

 	*
Reddit users unveil hidden Llama 3.1 prompt, [9] enhancing
personalization for AI developers.

 	*
OpenAI releases video demonstrating o1 models [10]' advanced reasoning
across complex domains like programming.

 	*
Meta releases Spirit LM, open-source multimodal model [11] integrating
text and speech seamlessly

📌 GUIDDE

 	*
Guidde's new AI extension [12] automates workflow capture and video
creation. Generate step-by-step guides, voiceovers, and visuals
instantly. 

⚙️ TOP TUTORIALS

 	*
Together Cookbooks [13]: Hands-on tutorials for multimodal RAG,
semantic search, and embedding visualization.

 	*
Pixeltable tutorial [14]: prompt engineering and model comparison with
Mistral AI models.

 	*
Memory systems for AI agents [15]: types, implementation, and
practical applications.

🧠 HOW-TO

 	*
How to run the popular open-source LLM QWen2.5 [16] on a 4GB GPU.

IF YOU'RE ENJOYING ALPHASIGNAL PLEASE FORWARD THIS EMAIL TO A
COLLEAGUE. 

It helps us keep this content free.

TOP NEWS

LLM

"1-BIT LLM" PAPER'S CODE IS OPEN-SOURCED, ENABLING LLMS ON LOCAL
DEVICES WITH 1.58-BIT QUANTIZATION

⇧ 19,486 Likes

WHAT'S NEW

BitNet 1-Bit LLM is a novel quantization technique that compresses
large language models to run efficiently on local devices. This method
reduces model parameters to just 1.58 bits, representing weights as
-1, 0, or +1, while maintaining performance. 

The original paper was published by Microsoft back in Feb-2024. Now
they made the code open-sourced as well.

KEY HIGHLIGHTS

 	*
Achieves 1.37x to 5.07x speedup on ARM CPUs

 	*
Reduces energy consumption by 55.4% to 70.0% on ARM

 	*
Enables running 100B parameter models on single CPUs

 	*
Supports fine-tuning existing models to BitNet architecture

 	*
The BitNet quantization process involves three steps: calculating the
average of absolute weight values, scaling weights by this average,
and rounding to the nearest of -1, 0, or +1. 

 	*
This extreme quantization significantly reduces computational demands
while preserving model functionality.

IMPLEMENTATION

While technically BitNet 1-Bit LLM is not a post-training quantization
method, however, recently Huggingface has shown, that you can
fine-tune a base language model to the BitNet 1.58b
architecture.  So you dont necessarily have to train a model from
scratch.  i.e. you can fine-tune an existing model to 1.58 bits.
This eliminates the need for costly training from scratch.

Experiments have successfully adapted a Llama3 8B model to 1.58-bit
precision, demonstrating the technique's versatility.

HuggingFace has also integrated BitNet into its Transformers library,
introducing a new "bitnet" quantization method. This implementation
replaces standard Linear layers with BitLinear layers.

PERFORMANCE

 	*
On x86 CPUs, BitNet achieves speedups ranging from 2.37x to 6.17x.

 	*
A practical demonstration shows a BitNet b1.58 3B model running on an
Apple M2 chip, achieving 5-7 tokens per second on a single CPU.

BitNet's extreme quantization opens new possibilities for on-device AI
applications.

LIMITATIONS

The scalability of BitNet to very large models without much loss of
generation quality models remains an area of ongoing research. While
the current results are promising for models up to 100B parameters,
further investigation is needed to determine its effectiveness for
even larger architectures.

		 READ MORE [5] 

		 [6] 

IT’S 2024, UPGRADE YOUR AI DATA CURATION AND LABELING PIPELINE

Encord unifies data sources, auto-curates, and labels optimal data for
models. It streamlines model evaluations. Generate high-quality data
10x  faster and enhance model performance by 20% with 30% less data.

KEY FEATURES

 	*
Quick cloud storage connection (AWS, GCP, Azure, OTC)

 	*
Centralized multimodal data access and visualization

 	*
Dataset filtering using 40+ metrics

 	*
Custom labeling workflows with access controls

 	*
Accelerated labeling using SOTA foundation models like SAM 2

Encord's latest update makes it the comprehensive AI data platform
developers need.

		 LEARN MORE [6] 

_partner with us [17]_

TRENDING SIGNALS

AI Agents

MICROSOFT INTRODUCES AUTONOMOUS AI AGENTS IN COPILOT STUDIO, ENABLING
DEVELOPERS TO CREATE CUSTOM, CONTEXT-AWARE ASSISTANTS [7]

⇧ 2,030 Likes

Anthropic

ANTHROPIC UNVEILS SABOTAGE EVALUATIONS FOR FRONTIER AI MODELS,
OPEN-SOURCING TESTS FOR FUTURE RISKS [8]

⇧ 958 Likes

Prompt Engineering

REDDIT USERS UNVEIL HIDDEN LLAMA 3.1 PROMPT, ENHANCING PERSONALIZATION
FOR AI DEVELOPERS [9]

⇧ 2,435 Likes

OpenAI

OPENAI RELEASES VIDEO DEMONSTRATING O1 MODELS' ADVANCED REASONING
ACROSS COMPLEX DOMAINS LIKE PROGRAMMING [10]

⇧ 1,696 Likes

Meta

META RELEASES SPIRIT LM, OPEN-SOURCE MULTIMODAL MODEL INTEGRATING TEXT
AND SPEECH SEAMLESSLY [11]

⇧ 2,600 Likes

AI-POWERED VIDEO WORKFLOWS IN A SINGLE CLICK

Transform the way you create and share complex workflows with Guidde,
an AI-powered platform that helps users produce engaging video
documentation instantly.

With Guidde’s GPT-powered extension, you can:

 	*
Design stunning visuals like a pro with no prior experience.

 	*
Take advantage of AI-generated step-by-step descriptions and
voiceovers.

 	*
Capture workflows effortlessly with Guidde's efficient browser
extension.

Experience the magic of AI-powered documentation and try Guidde’s
free extension today.

TRY IT [FREE] [12]

TOP TUTORIALS

RAG

TOGETHER COOKBOOKS: HANDS-ON TUTORIALS FOR MULTIMODAL RAG, SEMANTIC
SEARCH, AND EMBEDDING VISUALIZATION [13]

⇧ 141 Likes

Learn to build multimodal RAG systems using ColQwen2 and Llama 3.2 90b
Vision. Master semantic search, reranking, and JSON extraction
techniques. Visualize high-dimensional embeddings to grasp complex
data structures. These notebooks offer hands-on experience with
cutting-edge AI technologies. You'll gain skills in combining text and
image data for advanced information retrieval and analysis.

Prompt Engineering

PIXELTABLE TUTORIAL: PROMPT ENGINEERING AND MODEL COMPARISON WITH
MISTRAL AI MODELS [14]

⇧ 85 Likes

Learn how to use Pixeltable with Mistral AI models for efficient
prompt engineering and model comparison. This tutorial shows you how
to leverage persistent storage and incremental updates in your AI
workflows. You'll discover how to benchmark different prompts and
models easily. The guide demonstrates integrating custom analyses
using User-Defined Functions (UDFs). Gain practical skills in
iterative AI development and evaluation.

AI Agents

MEMORY SYSTEMS FOR AI AGENTS: TYPES, IMPLEMENTATION, AND PRACTICAL
APPLICATIONS [15]

⇧ 306 Likes

Learn about memory types in AI agents: procedural, semantic, and
episodic. Understand how to implement and update agent memory. Explore
in-path and background memory updating approaches. Discover
LangChain's tools for memory implementation. See real-world
applications of agent memory. Gain insights into improving agent
usefulness through effective memory systems.

HOW TO

Local LLM

HOW TO RUN THE POPULAR OPEN-SOURCE LLM QWEN2.5 ON A 4GB GPU

⇧ 1,100 Likes

The QWen2.5 is a 72bn parameter language model and it outperforms
Llama3 405B on most evaluation metrics. Running this model on the
cloud normally would require A100s and H100s cluster.

However in this tutorial you will run it on extremely limited
hardware. It uses a layer-by-layer inference technique, loading and
processing one model layer at a time to reduce GPU memory usage.
Instead of loading the entire 80-layer model into VRAM, we load and
process just one layer at a time.

This approach, implemented in the open-source AirLLM project. 

YOU WILL LEARN:

 	*
Layer-by-layer inference technique

 	*
Implementation using AirLLM

 	*
Asynchronous processing applications for LLMs

STEP-BY-STEP IMPLEMENTATION:

 	*
Install AirLLM from the GitHub repository

 	*
Import AutoModel from airllm

 	*
Load the QWen2.5 model using AutoModel.from_pretrained()

 	*
Prepare input text and tokenize it

 	*
Generate output using model.generate() with appropriate parameters

 	*
Decode and print the generated output

		 READ MORE [16] 

HOW WAS TODAY’S EMAIL?

NOT GREAT   GOOD    AMAZING

THANK YOU.

Scroll down to check out our latest additions.

Don't Miss October's Learn With The Nerds

Data Modeling for Power BI [2024 Edition]

By attending a Pragmatic Works live event, you have the unique opportunity to learn directly from one of our highly skilled trainers for FREE.

Expand your knowledge by signing up for our Learn With The Nerds event scheduled for October 24, 2024.

Data Modeling 2024 LWTN Social (https://pragmaticworks.com/e3t/Ctc/RC+113/c2G2g04/MVFC3kTRqHqW7fXNVt88P7__W842MfZ5mqSM0N5VHnV43prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3kFW1n4tdV9lFqczW40PkXy1gzcRJW1PPQY88cVc-QW15ztMg2wbt-TVmX3wg82CX15W39qMN_6RrNPlW51Mj3G8-gDPMW8WSX776ymNXLN76nHgB-BKc6W2ZBmbm2RzmWXW2NyKrL1KQvQ2N6670KSSwG4VN1yLYbC1P-TdW9dCCyf2f26-9W1CjbrS4DZ4XLW85y65l6S6YBgW85gxjp6trzcTW4q05jT2Gb3mdN66QWz0FtlMsW6C1H9r9kNZn1VX8dcN794_JVN815DrXTPt7JW6QzNC57Zd8nDW5WBbLb4vjMcDW23rz514LgnL8W7DTwwP3RbmnyW64-sZ174L-J5VnqXVY8HHgZZf4Djth204 )

Everything in Power BI is more complicated if you don’t build a good data model.

Business Intelligence consultants spend an entire career learning how to build data models, but NOT you!

Understanding the fundamentals of dimensional modeling (Star Schema) can get you very far in Power BI.

(https://pragmaticworks.com/e3t/Ctc/RC+113/c2G2g04/MVFC3kTRqHqW7fXNVt88P7__W842MfZ5mqSM0N5VHnV43prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3mtW6NpLKl4bS7fFW58kk602020BtW8gqFjD4d0hLnW8hP30F99SxrlW605jDY51Y5SyW7m-QfT8Lz_G_W6PF45H40D4v2W2FmQd44ksw-gW3RzwZR5jQXFnW3shwJR1nxhsjW4j5KxX6McGbsW2wR05K2PCqlzW62DYtH2C5t_FN6_Pmdm7KFTJW32YSxn6dMNwjW8r907S68Dd8WW8XtCWB7KxFWNW7651445Bz07vW632D_95XBR3qW85yJWJ27XvmtN8WpJ5CymcYLW8jXYZK9hWT3zW1p9s403rBzQsW3p11cN4B_D3VN6ZkSwmrLmMcW8nNTzg3lMl6qW7cvPY04BqwzBN9kBXH6DRdv1f41sQj404 )

Power BI

This in-depth 4-day Power BI Boot Camp takes a deep dive into the Power BI ecosystem, where you will learn from start to finish how to develop solutions and solve complex business problems.

Upcoming Sessions:

• December 9-12

• January 13-16

• February 10-13

Microsoft Fabric

The Microsoft Fabric bootcamp provides a comprehensive overview of the capabilities of Data Factory, Azure Synapse, and Power BI, seamlessly integrated into the Power BI Service. Participants will gain proficiency in the intricacies of the Data Lakehouse architecture, utilizing various technologies such as pipelines, notebooks, and Dataflows Gen 2.

Upcoming Session:

• November 12-15

• January 21-24

DAX Boot Camp

Enhance your DAX knowledge to a point where you will have all the tools needed to create any kind of calculation within the DAX language. You will also be learning about DAX best practices, performance tuning, and much more!

Upcoming Sessions:

• December 2-5

• February 18-21

Advanced Power BI

Welcome to our Advanced Power BI 5-Day training - that is intensive, tailored for data experts and analytics aficionados. In this immersive bootcamp, we dive deep into the heart of Power BI, focusing on advanced techniques designed to elevate your data analysis and visualization skills. You have the option to purchase individual days of this training as well.

Upcoming Sessions:

• November 18-22

• January 27-31

Microsoft Copilot Bootcamp

Join us for an immersive five-day training program designed to master Microsoft Copilot's capabilities. The program includes an introduction to Microsoft Copilot Studio, covering conversational AI and how to build custom Copilots. You can also purchase groups of days of this training.

Upcoming Sessions:

• November 18-22

• February 3-7

Power BI PL-300 Bootcamp

In this comprehensive course, we will cover each functional group in detail and have hands-on experience demonstrating the skills that are expected of a Power BI Data Analyst.

Upcoming Sessions:

• November 4-7

• February 24-27

Virtual Power BI: Paginated Reports Bootcamp

You will learn how to use Report Builder to connect to data, make reports dynamic and share reports with others.

Upcoming Sessions:

• December 9-11

Azure Data Factory Bootcamp

In this boot camp, you will learn how to create data-driven pipelines to direct the movement of data in your organization and how it can be used as an orchestration tool.

Upcoming Sessions:

• February 3-5

Power Automate

The Power Automate Boot Camp is an intensive course that is designed for the citizen developer to design and automate workflow processes in the cloud or from your desktop.

Upcoming Sessions:

• December 2-4

• January 13-15

Power Apps

This in-depth 4-day Power Apps Boot Camp takes a deep dive into the Power Apps ecosystem, showing all three application types: canvas, model-driven, and portal application solutions.

Upcoming Sessions:

• December 9-12

• January 27-30

Power Platform

The Power Platform is a collection of products offered by Microsoft, which includes Dataverse, Power Apps, Power Automate and Power BI. These products provide the means to help you, the Citizen Developers, build your own low-code applications, automate your business process, and design reports with robust visuals that drive decision-making.

Upcoming Sessions:

• November 12-15

Microsoft Excel

The Introduction to Excel Boot Camp is an intensive course that is designed to get you to use Excel comfortably.

Upcoming Session:

• January 21-24

Subject: 24 Hour Reminder ⏰ - Discover LakeheadU Webinar
Message: Email from Lakehead University International Save your seat at our upcoming live webinar and learn about Lakehead University   Hi Ayush! We're less than 24 hours away from our live Discover LakeheadU webinar! Learn more or save your spot by registering below.     Discover LakeheadU Tuesday, October 22, 2024 9:00 - 10:00 AM in Eastern Time (Canada) (view in your time zone)﻿   Learn More & Register   Lakehead University is celebrated as one of Canada's leading academic institutions with a comprehensive range of programs. Join us during this live webinar, where you will learn about our beautiful campuses in Thunder Bay and Orillia, the scenic and vibrant communities where they’re located, our 85+ degree programs, and dynamic student life. Learn about the Lakehead difference and why students from over 80 nations choose the #1 university in North America with under 10,000 students (Times Higher Education Global Impact Rankings 2024). Our recruitment team will be leading the presentation and hosting a live question & answer period. Register today!     Looking forward to connecting with you Jordan Ball International New & Social Media Officer Lakehead University - International Enrolment   Explore Lakehead's 85+ undergraduate and graduate programs Visit our Website             Lakehead University - International Enrolment | 955 Oliver Road | Thunder Bay, ON P7B 5E1 CA Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

Subject: QS Arab Rankings 2025: Now live!
Message:
Your guide the Arab region’s top universities: QS World University Rankings: Arab 2025 released

Ranking: Arab region 2025 (https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VVwGqL4stXZ3W8TBH4L5blHMmW2F3lfm5mpWTdN1MKF_83prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3nTW7dcPQm5NpbwSW3_JFrX1C3_c3W2ygbyZ2566LqW6DXB-28BpzmcW76KJwG34F_FKW6KNmW87Zp7DTW8ndyXK6YXW6-V3sjdq2Kg9zkW1gX7xw460DD2W1B6p1L5XFdqZW38kJL81f_gqKVLjbrK2bDr8ZW8HXx_k6tGZVlW8rpb8t3gk5vfVcRq356ZX8k1N4ZPD-Hg6fxBW2Z0-pm4QG7zSW7cfLNR1Tm5VnW6p8sLP6hVnDYN28rVxRjS04TW8Hl8mG2BBQr9W1n5jBY7w7kkdW26n4c_2d2p5sN2MbNWy1XyZnV8WBgK7kwq6WW4SWPQM5Gp73wN18XzXyrtqmQW6g4bCg5dG5n4f2xrwH-04 )

Hi,

Big news! The QS World University Rankings: Arab Region 2025 are now live.

This year, we’ve analysed 246 institutions to give you the clearest view of the top universities in the region. With criteria (https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VVwGqL4stXZ3W8TBH4L5blHMmW2F3lfm5mpWTdN1MKF-T3prCCW7Y8-PT6lZ3lWW1rZgDX7_swSfW8gQfzC4XFkRVW914NQ691WYrjW74T8q33Snwy1W4xDg7c1WG1tnW4FZZw03cr0zFW8_PNgB5RmNDdW1h1KfW4DyyfhW14Lz1d40yZlLW2xSzQs2qyJQtW7FHN0X67B5TPW5MVs7n6HBnj0VPXVxz1sJWdZW8-VmZB1k8-19W7MSsC16KDLxDW9fNNmq2TpDsXW7wWDWn48WDxfW18mnHK4kKq82W4xqlYj7Fyr0zW34j47r6wXJ88W9lrlNy3Yx09lW34P57P2pGPVqW2Rnd5B6T7_w_N4dj9ddr-Gb-W2KrLf01q-0S-W2Z_TmQ1S3Tbqd2F66n04 ) including employer reputation, faculty student ratio and international research, use these rankings to find the best universities, based on your own priorities.

Who made the list this year?

Explore the full rankings
(https://qs.topuniversities.com/e3t/Ctc/L0+113/d32kbs04/VVwGqL4stXZ3W8TBH4L5blHMmW2F3lfm5mpWTdN1MKF_83prCCW8wLKSR6lZ3nTW7dcPQm5NpbwSW3_JFrX1C3_c3W2ygbyZ2566LqW6DXB-28BpzmcW76KJwG34F_FKW6KNmW87Zp7DTW8ndyXK6YXW6-V3sjdq2Kg9zkW1gX7xw460DD2W1B6p1L5XFdqZW38kJL81f_gqKVLjbrK2bDr8ZW8HXx_k6tGZVlW8rpb8t3gk5vfVcRq356ZX8k1N4ZPD-Hg6fxBW2Z0-pm4QG7zSW7cfLNR1Tm5VnW6p8sLP6hVnDYN28rVxRjS04TW8Hl8mG2BBQr9W1n5jBY7w7kkdW26n4c_2d2p5sN2MbNWy1XyZnV8WBgK7kwq6WW4SWPQM5Gp73wN18XzXyrtqmQW6g4bCg5dG5n4f2xrwH-04 )

Top three

- King Fahd University of Petroleum & Minerals, Saudi Arabia has once again claimed the top spot as the best university in the region for the second consecutive year.
- Qatar University moves up from third place.
- King Saud University, Saudia Arabia spends its second year in the top three.

We’re here for you throughout your study abroad journey.

Best wishes,

The QS Team

Subject: Thank you for applying to Hudson River Trading!
Message:
Hi Ayush,

Thank you for your interest in Hudson River Trading's 2025 Software Engineering Internship! Please see below for information on the program and details about the interview process.

About the Program:

* This program will focus on software engineering (primarily in C++ and Python) in the algorithmic trading industry and will not be involved with quantitative research.
* In addition to real projects, you'll enjoy a curriculum of talks, mentorships, and social events throughout the summer.
* The program is intended for full-time students who will be looking for full-time roles with a start date between February and August 2026.
* The duration of the internship is 11 weeks. Specific dates to be announced.

Please note that we do not allow multiple applications. When we review your application, we will consider you for all available positions to determine the best fit and reach out accordingly regarding any next steps.

Given the volume of applications we receive for this position, please allow up to two weeks for your application to be reviewed. Once again, thank you for your interest in our Software Engineering Internship. We look forward to starting the process!

Regards,

HRT Campus Team

** Please note: Do not reply to this email. This email is sent from an unattended mailbox. Replies will not be read.

Subject: Thanks for applying to Google
Message:
Hi Ayush Pokharel,

Thanks for applying to Google! There are a ton of great companies out  
there, so we appreciate your interest in joining our team.

While we’re not able to reach out to every applicant, our recruiting team  
will contact you if your skills and experience are a strong match for the  
role. In the meantime, join the conversation about job opportunities and  
life at Google on our LinkedIn page:  
https://www.linkedin.com/company/google/.

Thanks,

Google Recruiting


Learn more about our Equal Employment Opportunity policy:  
https://careers.google.com/eeo/ and the EEOC's "Equal Employment  
Opportunity is The Law" (PDF):  
https://careers.google.com/static/files/eeoisthelaw.pdf

Pay Transparency Policy
Google's Pay Transparency Policy ensures that you won't be discharged or  
discriminated against based on whether you've inquired about, discussed, or  
disclosed your pay.  Read the full policy (PDF):  
https://careers.google.com/static/files/paytransparency.pdf

The information you provide will be used in accordance with Google's  
applicant and candidate privacy policy:  
https://careers.google.com/privacy-policy/.

How you learn is just as important as what you’re learning. edX’s educational offerings include flexible learning formats to support your lifestyle and learning needs. 

 Fuel your ambition with:
1.A welcome discount, that helps you save 30% on select programs, including verified courses, boot camps, MicroMasters® Programs, and more.* 
2.Asynchronous learning, so you can complete modules from anywhere and on your own schedule. 
3.Part-time, full-time, and self-paced options that allow you to balance your personal and professional commitments with your learnings. 
4.Instructor-led courses that offer you the structure and support you need to achieve your career goals. 
5.Varying price points — from free courses to full degrees — so you can invest your time and resources wisely.

Whether you’re starting fresh or returning to complete your degree, an undergraduate course or program can open up a new world of opportunities — and show employers you're ready for your next big step. Learn from expert faculty who are passionate about helping you achieve your goals, while you upskill in high-demand fields. It’s all about flexibility, so set your own schedule to balance work and personal achievement.
 
Explore top courses
https://click.sfmc.edx.org/?qs=f6e124f4e73c5dd099a6b8f1af7ce78f11ba3c9660af1e3ba57f0c2077d46753bd053748b97df3db9f4a625bb90a3b98fe671b0da3eb8b1aa667044a852b8886
 
MicroBachelors(R)
programs
  
 You don’t have to wait years to change your future. Learn work-relevant skills and earn transferable college credits — preparing you for the next step in your career or education.

 Pathway into University of London Online Degree Programs.

Bachelor's
degrees
  
 Combine high-quality education with the flexibility of earning your undergraduate degree online. Explore your passions and develop valuable skills — paving your way to a fulfilling career.

Subject: Are you ready to match with employers?
Let your next job find you
Thanks for submitting!
Thanks for applying to Google
Message:
Hi Ayush Pokharel,

Thanks for applying to Google! There are a ton of great companies out  
there, so we appreciate your interest in joining our team.

While we’re not able to reach out to every applicant, our recruiting team  
will contact you if your skills and experience are a strong match for the  
role. In the meantime, join the conversation about job opportunities and  
life at Google on our LinkedIn page:  
https://www.linkedin.com/company/google/.

Thanks,

Google Recruiting


Learn more about our Equal Employment Opportunity policy:  
https://careers.google.com/eeo/ and the EEOC's "Equal Employment  
Opportunity is The Law" (PDF):  
https://careers.google.com/static/files/eeoisthelaw.pdf

Pay Transparency Policy
Google's Pay Transparency Policy ensures that you won't be discharged or  
discriminated against based on whether you've inquired about, discussed, or  
disclosed your pay.  Read the full policy (PDF):  
https://careers.google.com/static/files/paytransparency.pdf

The information you provide will be used in accordance with Google's  
applicant and candidate privacy policy:  
https://careers.google.com/privacy-policy/.

Subject: Cheery Friday Greetings (okay, a little late) from Barb Oakley!
Message:
Cheery Friday Greetings (okay, a little late) from Barb Oakley! 


Book of the Year: AI’s Future Unveiled


ChatGPT and the Future of AI: The Deep Language Revolution
<https://eventing.coursera.org/redirect/DvlcBWlaOkQwOJX6bjb6USYbt-D6s3xgPay7EjfyKMcN43En7oyhbHiaFN-Zu-1gly_kMXmdhNGteWe33FJ6QA.rJtv47SiR_hrAaDbEV_YZA.F2_P1KlAwvZaTjahIsBzN5gRPfMJrmtXebRx3xM7Hs0vyTMWMT2CbGW7b_yYO_CkmKenxA5-GWk7enFkUT4Du8D-5QfFT1q69bGL2D1Yw1sUMwuIXu_D_rOoYwi8L7rxAcWd3HbO-FFq6ppV1tdJOwyfgmvfLkfXtFSOCafLgGdto49bD8vT9WTzD58ea3UJSR2aKCTTxpTLJY1D0Wq8cOZko5HAoDV8HMCXLXv9XIp-q0UZXgt30acOJsB3tqK1dotdKQOks7tfuYSi6akeqsGDMvjrLJgweH3vEBWvNYoub1LC47fyAhvFRBST4xpXAUu5kdupLCVHwhOkmYKGhrrkOwFEl2mq3oI0D8pP23KaLa_0cN4oowOiIjn4948wzonO27A8jknr0x8S7gGDk8mf7QCEV2Tv9weqc9fh1fhf3HFgseValL1CeqFPSUGV_8dhde90oD3E6XZ-SNb8eRPGwHRZWCL9J-3Os_amz7eUQKRaQMVDpTeugMz7OXqEmrX_VHMmY5liSycCVoWIcn_7aIvl8J4n0LNMF6D_S3i7i-h395xcotZfZGtoDtNAPDi2kxxhXBjNn3ideWX2K5pPrFutlchqHKBGOG1GrmUfKS-cfBUvXap8IyS5Imb3XiPUBqpsSUNsJlQTZ8mXRgCLDdrQ6HyuRIl0HJ7Ru_Uw9w--h0gX058VpX9tJh1dGUupgYDznZpkZwAMLZXL2bc77QErmpz3oBRa1DCIyHs> 
by Terrence J. Sejnowski. Our very own Terry's latest masterpiece is a 
thrilling journey into the heart of AI. From the evolution of language 
models to the ethical dilemmas of self-improving algorithms, Terry guides 
us with clarity and wit. He draws fascinating parallels between human and 
artificial intelligence, offering profound insights into the future of 
machine learning. Whether you're an AI novice or a tech enthusiast, this 
book illuminates the transformative power of AI in science and society. 
Terry's unique blend of expertise and accessible writing makes complex 
concepts engaging and thought-provoking. ChatGPT and the Future of AI 
isn't just informative—it's a glimpse into a future where AI reshapes our 
world in ways we're only beginning to imagine. A must-read for anyone 
curious about the AI revolution unfolding before our eyes.


Education Without Borders: Barb's Month of Global Discoveries

, and the remarkable resilience and spirit of the Ukrainian people, which 
must be experienced to be believed. (I spent part of every night in Kyiv 
responding to air raid alerts by heading to the lower parking garage of the 
Radisson Blu—just a minor inconvenience compared to what Ukrainians have 
experienced over the past several years.) As I learned during my visit, 
deliberate targeting of Ukrainian schools and playgrounds has been taking 
place—the results are heartbreaking. But the determination of Ukrainians, 
especially when it comes to their resolute focus on uplifting their 
educational system, is inspiring.  


The Kazakhs, too, deserve special mention. Their polymath, multilingual 
Minister of Science & Higher Education, Sayasat Nurbek
<https://eventing.coursera.org/redirect/ZiPoa_q-EJC6GqvcZu_bDzAgFmiO0PcjOqUB_pFTBxYfvogDF0la2iUf24gi9L9ZycubidbtzNLntb5QA4ENCA.BDNOGSdFarZZ3WCbJA5XCQ.rEsxnPCBhG9XMtRUS7o2NspEsDXuem4crPB1Y-KiFs2KSCdvf3hSxAGoWBSJ1vQH8Cy6EtpnaVkuTsSzjzb4DH3Ut4L-76JqTistQuskT7sl9eBg6p-ikMTHJtX9lZ1OTDcUgWSwOmUhE9eNTNoPsqaCZDpHHqf7gzZ6nw8NVsXHO01ps5mCzbjzhmvv2d-zGNsD3SVT5KDVoFDFM8jSATMBZzS9JIXR7YQWaaR_m1ORKCnq5_0QdXz1h1lEQdhAlKwNFfhh1J6QGwDqyVfUMtmHnhfjy-VkBa2iU3jxDChzmGR1-lRt0CSy7n_fsu-s7PtBJs2ZehOz_EqQ-8_CVHZsGug-QzyAfekJxCw06g-z4iFkRUkN4wjmhcfSpb5nqVDf044KWs3dq_H-v8adDvKoiF_MatmbXfxpdZDEkwxpCKhnGSwk0Ru315NjJJeNMrijNNU45JbcZS72Zs_-e84MT7Il9g39CqtRNdYtKa362rRzsqrL-nUu78dXSOx7MaegKaq4vCozgE1YUJDQlw3gV5o2y80lAc6X1WV0mjQecMmpJa8XkcICKZX_U8JjWfCl0dS3g-HF9CvzfoAEIzpCXqQ0cOpRuM56Wztq6i3fuvJzYjTAk7KEkQlCwEvFSVVXizJ7GRHsACrIYDAPWw> 
, is pulling Kazakh higher education into a world-wide network of top-notch 
universities—some 35 branch campuses, extensions, and consortia from 
international institutions have been established in the last two years 
alone. Nurbek’s example can be an inspiration to ministries worldwide about 
the power of educational vision in vaulting a country forward economically.
