Subject: SHEIN Order Delivered Notification
Crack-Fill and Re-Striping Project Notice
Message:
Dear Residents, 
 

We hope this message finds you well! We want to inform you that we will be undertaking a crack-fill and re-striping project in our community parking lot starting Monday, October 14 through Tuesday, October 22. This maintenance work is essential to ensure the longevity and beautification of our roadways. We can’t wait to see the result!

Attached you will find a sectioned map for the areas that are scheduled for each day.

  • Monday 14th – Red Hash Area
  • Tuesday 15th and Wednesday 16th - Pink Area
  • Thursday 17th and Friday 18th - Green Area
  • Monday 21st - Orange Area
  • Tuesday 22nd - Yellow Area

Please ensure your vehicle is moved by 8:00 AM on your day of service. Vehicles can return at 4:00 PM each day. Towing will be enforced at the owner’s expense if not promptly moved.

We appreciate your understanding and cooperation during this time, and we apologize for any inconvenience this may cause. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to reach out!

Best regards,


River Oaks Villas

(512) 392-6955

rovillas@eenhoorn.com

 
 

1900 Aquarena Springs Drive | San Marcos | TX | 78666
 

1900 Aquarena Springs Drive, San Marcos, TX 78666

This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com. To ensure you continue receiving our emails, please add us to your address book or safe list. You can opt out of email notifications by clicking here.

Subject: 🔥 New VPTQ technique enables 70B LLM on single GPU
Message:
On Andrej Karpathy, Open Source, New Quantization research, LLM
Jailbreak and many more.. 

SIGNUP [1]  |  ADVERTISE [2]  |  FOLLOW ON X [3]  |  READ
ON WEB [4]

ALPHASIGNAL

 . 

HEY ,

Welcome to today's edition of AlphaSignal, a newsletter for developers
by developers.

We identify and summarize the top 1% news, papers, models, and repos
in the AI industry. 

IN TODAY'S SIGNAL

_Read time: 4 min 39 sec_

🎖️ TOP NEWS

 	*
New Research Vector Post-Training Quantization [5] Achieves 2-Bit
Compression for LLMs

📌 OXYLABS

 	*
OxyCopilot from Oxylabs: AI assistant generates request code and
parses instructions [6]. No manual coding needed.

⚡️ TRENDING SIGNALS

 	*
Karpathy reveals unexpected convergence in LLM outputs [7], sparking
debate on fine-tuning diversity.

 	*
Researchers unveil LOTUS: open-source diffusion-based visual
foundation model [8] for high-quality dense prediction.

 	*
New study introduces Posterior-Mean Rectified Flow, [9] enhancing
photo-realistic face restoration with optimal MSE.

 	*
An Open-source Github repository releases 1,405 jailbreak prompts
[10].

 	*
New open-source python package, supervision [11] allows developers to
implement line crossing detection in 30 minutes.

🛠️ TRENDING REPOS

 	*
manim [12]: Python framework for creating mathematical animations.

 	*
agents: [13] Build real-time multimodal AI applications.

 	*
Python [14]: All Algorithms implemented in Python

🧠 RECOMMENDED LECTURE

 	*
Anthropic prompt caching: [15] optimize API calls for faster LLM
interactions.

IF YOU'RE ENJOYING ALPHASIGNAL PLEASE FORWARD THIS EMAIL TO A
COLLEAGUE. 

It helps us keep this content free.

TOP NEWS

LLM Research

NEW RESEARCH VECTOR POST-TRAINING QUANTIZATION ACHIEVES 2-BIT
COMPRESSION FOR LLMS

⇧ 986 Likes

WHAT'S NEW

Vector Post-Training Quantization (VPTQ) is a new technique that
compresses large language models to extremely low bit-widths without
retraining.

It addresses the challenge of deploying massive models on
resource-constrained devices by using vector quantization instead of
traditional scalar-based weight quantization.

KEY HIGHLIGHTS

 	*
Compresses 405B parameter models to 1-2 bits in ~17 hours

 	*
Enables 70B parameter model inference on a single RTX 4090 GPU

 	*
Outperforms GPTQ, QuIP#, and AQLM in perplexity and accuracy

 	*
Maintains high inference throughput with low quantization overhead

 	*
Supports PyTorch, TensorFlow, and Hugging Face Transformers

 	*
Experiments demonstrate reduced quantization perplexity and increased
accuracy and inference throughput across benchmarks like LLaMA-2,
Mistral-7B, and LLaMA-3 compared to state-of-the-art methods.

CORE INNOVATION

 	*
VPTQ's core innovation lies in its use of Second-Order Optimization
and Channel-Independent Second-Order Optimization.

 	*
This approach minimizes quantization errors and allows for more
efficient compression.

 	*
The method compresses weight vectors into indices using lookup tables,
achieving better accuracy at 1-2 bits compared to other methods.

PERFORMANCE METRICS

 	*
Performance metrics demonstrate VPTQ's effectiveness. For the LLaMA-2
70B model quantized to 2.07 bits, VPTQ achieves a perplexity of 3.93
on WikiText-2, an inference speed of 9.7 tokens/second, and memory
usage of 19.54 GB.

 	*
These results indicate minimal loss in model quality while
significantly reducing computational requirements.

The scalability of VPTQ is evident in its ability to handle models up
to 405B parameters. This suggests potential applicability to even
larger models, though specific performance on architectures beyond the
LLaMA family remains to be explored. The method's impact on downstream
task performance compared to full-precision models is an area for
further investigation.

		 READ MORE [5] 

		 [6] 

FIRST AI COPILOT FOR BUILDING WEB SCRAPERS

OxyCopilot, a new AI-powered tool from Oxylabs, helps developers build
scalable web scrapers and parsers. It identifies complex website
patterns, including nested and listed data, enabling data extraction
without coding.

This free tool streamlines the scraping process, allowing developers
to focus on results.

With the help of OxyCopilot, you can: 

 	*
Parse raw HTML into structured data 

 	*
Adapt to web layout changes in seconds

 	*
Free up your time and focus on results

		 TEST FOR FREE [6] 

_partner with us [16]_

TRENDING SIGNALS

Andrej Karpathy

KARPATHY REVEALS UNEXPECTED CONVERGENCE IN LLM OUTPUTS, SPARKING
DEBATE ON FINE-TUNING DIVERSITY [7]

⇧ 6,200 Likes

Diffusion Model

RESEARCHERS UNVEIL LOTUS: OPEN-SOURCE DIFFUSION-BASED VISUAL
FOUNDATION MODEL FOR HIGH-QUALITY DENSE PREDICTION [8]

⇧ 1,025 Likes

Computer Vision

NEW STUDY INTRODUCES POSTERIOR-MEAN RECTIFIED FLOW, ENHANCING
PHOTO-REALISTIC FACE RESTORATION WITH OPTIMAL MSE [9]

⇧ 1,400 Likes

Prompt Engineering

AN OPEN-SOURCE GITHUB REPOSITORY RELEASES 1,405 JAILBREAK PROMPTS.
[10]

⇧ 1,401 Likes

Computer Vision

NEW OPEN-SOURCE PYTHON PACKAGE, SUPERVISION ALLOWS DEVELOPERS TO
IMPLEMENT LINE CROSSING DETECTION IN 30 MINUTES [11]

⇧ 1,000 Likes

TRENDING REPOS

Math Animation

MANIM [12]

☆ 21,600 Stars

Manim helps you create programmatic math animations. It's a Python
library for generating explanatory videos, like those on 3Blue1Brown.
You can render complex mathematical concepts visually. It supports
both 2D and 3D animations. The community version offers frequent
updates and extensive documentation.

Agents

AGENTS [13] 

☆ 2,600 Stars

Helps you build AI agents that process and generate real-time text,
audio, video, and images via LiveKit sessions. It integrates popular
LLMs, STT, TTS services, and RAG databases. You can create voice
assistants with turn detection, interruption handling, and function
calling. It supports local, self-hosted, and cloud deployments with
load balancing.

Algorithm

PYTHON [14]

☆ 190,000 Stars

Helps you learn and implement algorithms in Python. You'll find code
for various domains like computer vision, data structures, and machine
learning. It's community-driven, with 100+ contributors. The codebase
follows black formatting and uses pre-commit hooks for quality
control.

LECTURE

Prompt Caching

ANTHROPIC PROMPT CACHING: OPTIMIZE API CALLS FOR FASTER LLM
INTERACTIONS.

⇧ 5100 Likes

Prompt Caching is a new API feature that optimizes large language
model interactions. It caches and reuses consistent parts of prompts,
reducing processing time and costs for repetitive tasks. 

This technique is particularly useful for scenarios involving large
contexts, multiple examples, or long conversations. Prompt Caching
works by checking if a prompt prefix is already cached from a recent
query and using it if found, otherwise processing and caching the full
prompt.

YOU'LL LEARN ABOUT:

 	*
Implementing Prompt Caching with the Messages API

 	*
Structuring prompts for effective caching

 	*
Cache limitations and supported models

 	*
Tracking cache performance

 	*
Pricing structure for cached content

 	*
Best practices for optimizing cache usage

 	*
Troubleshooting common issues

 	*
Privacy and data separation in caching

올해는 한국 파트너분들만을 위해 특별히 한국어로 진행됩니다.

Dolma Impact Fund shared a post: In a heartfelt speech, our CEO, Tim Gocher OBE DL, reflects on the challenges many Nepalis face, often leaving their homeland in search of work abroad. At Dolma Impact Fund, we're committed to creating meaningful opportunities within Nepal to empower local communities. Through the Dolma Foundation, Tim is also giving hope to underprivileged children with scholarships, helping them build brighter futures.

Watch the full video on Instagram: https://lnkd.in/dwP9faQa

If you'd like to be part of this journey and help a child reach their dreams, visit: https://lnkd.in/diFxcsr3

Subject: Get on track with earning points

From: Bentley University Office of Graduate Admission <applygrad@bentley.edu>
Subject: Bentley McCallum Graduate School of Business Newsletter October 2024
Message:
Wall Street Journal Ranks Bentley 11th Best College in U.S.


                        Bentley University is the 11th best college in the United States, according to a new Wall Street Journal ranking. The new 2025 Best Colleges in the U.S. ranking measures how well a college sets graduates up for financial success, including the support it provides to help them graduate and projected future earnings during their career. Bentley is the top-ranked business-focused university in the United States, according to the ranking.                       


LEARN MORE <https://www.bentley.edu/news/wall-street-journal-ranks-bentley-11th-best-college-us>


Bentley Hosts Business Leaders from Accenture, MetLife and Citizens Massachusetts


                        Top executives from Accenture, MetLife and Citizens Massachusetts joined a panel discussion moderated by Bentley University President E. LaBrent Chrite that tackled the ethical use of artificial intelligence (AI), corporate activism and creating an inclusive work culture, among other topics.

LEARN MORE <https://www.bentley.edu/news/bentley-hosts-business-leaders-accenture-metlife-and-citizens-massachusetts>


Bentley's Newest Benefactors Support Endowed Professorship of Free Speech and Free Enterprise


                        Longtime donors Bruce '73 and Patricia Bartlett have partnered with Bentley to introduce a new professorship examining how free speech promotes society's ability to thrive and innovate for the good of all. The Bartletts' $2 million gift builds on the couple's decades-long support for Bentley, inspired by Mr. Bartlett's own career-changing experience. 

LEARN MORE <https://www.bentley.edu/news/bentleys-newest-great-benefactors-support-endowed-professorship-free-speech-and-free>


Historic Wind Energy Agreement Expected to Power 100% of Bentley University Campus Operations 


                        Bentley University has entered a transaction to purchase electricity generated by the Kibby Wind Farm located in Maine — a move anticipated to power 100% of campus operations through the end of 2027. The four-year agreement, signed in December 2023, aligns with the university's Sustainability and Climate Action Plan, which commits to carbon neutrality by 2030.    

LEARN MORE <https://www.bentley.edu/news/historic-wind-energy-agreement-expected-power-100-bentley-university-campus-operations>


                        Bentley accepts graduate applications for Spring and Fall 2025 for MBA and Master of Science programs. Join us for a virtual workshop to get your application questions answered. Admission representatives will review the application process and discuss the steps needed to submit and complete your graduate admission application.

Application Workshop: Completing the process

                        Thursday, October 17, 2024, 12:00pm-1pm Eastern Time via Zoom
                        Register: https://applygrad.bentley.edu/register/AppWorkshopOct17

                        Thursday, October 17, 2024, 5:30pm-6:30pm Eastern Time via Zoom
                        Register: https://applygrad.bentley.edu/register/AppWorkshopOct17e


Apply Now <https://www.bentley.edu/graduate/apply>


Attend an Event <https://www.bentley.edu/graduate/events>


Connect With Admission <https://www.bentley.edu/graduate/connect>


 


This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com by Bentley University Office of Graduate Admission.
Unsubscribe from Bentley University. <https://applygrad.bentley.edu/go?r=optout&mid=599f09d0-58bb-463f-9fd5-72d0b3c28b43>

Subject: 🔥 OpenAI launches Canvas: GPT-4o-powered collaboration tool
Message:
On OpenAI, Abacusai, Anthropic, Mila - Quebec Artificial Intelligence
Institute and many more.. 

SIGNUP [1]  |  ADVERTISE [2]  |  FOLLOW ON X [3]  |  READ
ON WEB [4]

ALPHASIGNAL

 . 

HEY ,

Welcome to today's edition of AlphaSignal, a newsletter for developers
by developers.

We identify and summarize the top 1% news, papers, models, and repos
in the AI industry. 

IN TODAY'S SIGNAL

_Read time: 6 min 34 sec_

🎖️ TOP NEWS

 	*
OpenAI Launches Canvas [5], A New Interface for AI-Assisted Writing
and Coding.

📌 ENCORD

 	*
Boost Computer Vision model accuracy [6]. Find relevant data in vast
image/video sets.

⚡️ TRENDING SIGNALS

 	*
GitHub repo goes viral that implements AI bot applying to 1000 jobs
[7] in 24h, getting 50 interviews.

 	*
Abacusai releases Dracarys 2 [8], an open-source coding model
outperforming Claude 3.5 Sonnet on LiveCodeBench.

 	*
Researchers unveil prompting technique boosting Claude 3.5 Sonnet [9]
to match O1 models on complex reasoning.

 	*
Anthropic introduces automatic Artifact error fixing [10] in Claude,
streamlining workflow for AI developers.

 	*
New research shows simplified RNNs rivaling transformers with 2.5x
[11] fewer training steps.

📌 FIDDLER

 	*
Learn how to score LLMs with Fiddler Trust Service: [12] Guided tour.

🧠 TOP TUTORIALS

 	*
firecrawl: [13] open-source web crawler for LLM-ready data extraction.

 	*
Learn to build generative AI apps with Microsoft's free [14],
comprehensive course.

 	*
Understand how the architectures [15] look like under the hood of
Llama 3.2

🧠 HOW TO

 	*
Learn to create optimal production-ready RAG setup for your data
automatically with RagBuilder [16]

IF YOU'RE ENJOYING ALPHASIGNAL PLEASE FORWARD THIS EMAIL TO A
COLLEAGUE. 

It helps us keep this content free.

TOP NEWS

OpenAI

OPENAI LAUNCHES CANVAS, A NEW INTERFACE FOR AI-ASSISTED WRITING AND
CODING.

⇧ 24,162 Likes

WHAT'S NEW

OpenAI has introduced Canvas, a new interface for ChatGPT that
enhances collaboration on writing and coding projects.

Canvas opens in a separate window, allowing users to work alongside
ChatGPT beyond simple chat interactions. It's currently in beta and
available to ChatGPT Plus and Team users, with plans to expand access.

KEY HIGHLIGHTS

 	*
Powered by GPT-4o, a model trained for creative collaboration

 	*
Enables inline feedback and targeted edits

 	*
Offers writing and coding shortcuts for various tasks

 	*
Trained using synthetic data generation techniques

 	*
Outperforms baseline GPT-4o in accuracy and quality metrics

 	*
Canvas addresses limitations of the chat interface for tasks requiring
editing and revisions. It enables ChatGPT to understand project
context better and provide inline feedback.

 	*
Users can highlight specific sections for focused AI assistance and
directly edit text or code.

 	*
The interface includes shortcuts for adjusting writing length,
changing reading levels, and adding polish.

 	*
For coding, Canvas offers code review, bug fixing, and language
translation capabilities.

The model powering Canvas, GPT-4o, was trained to collaborate as a
creative partner. OpenAI developed core behaviors like triggering the
canvas, generating diverse content, making targeted edits, and
providing inline critique. They used synthetic data generation
techniques, including outputs from OpenAI o1-preview, to post-train
the model without relying on human-generated data.

PERFORMANCE METRICS

 	*
Performance metrics show significant improvements over baseline GPT-4o
with prompted instructions:

 	*
Writing tasks: 83% accuracy in correct canvas triggers

 	*
Coding tasks: 94% accuracy in correctly not triggering the canvas

 	*
Comment quality and accuracy: 30% improvement in accuracy, 16% in
quality

 	*
Canvas uses a decision boundary to determine when to trigger for
writing and coding tasks.

For writing, the model prioritizes "correct triggers" over "correct
non-triggers." In coding, it's biased against triggering to avoid
disrupting power users. The model is trained to perform targeted edits
when users select specific text, otherwise favoring rewrites.

		 READ MORE [5] 

		 [6] 

CURATE & ANNOTATE THE PURR-FECT DATA FOR YOUR AI MODELS

New: Vision-native data platform boosts computer vision AI
performance.

Developers struggling with low mAP scores can now leverage a
just-released data curation and labeling platform. It tackles the
challenge of searching through millions of images and videos to find
relevant training data.

The platform uses embedding models, filters, and natural language
search to help developers visualize, sort, and enrich data
efficiently. This approach enables the selection of high-quality
datasets for developing more accurate AI models.

KEY FEATURES INCLUDE:

 	*
Embedding-based search

 	*
Advanced filtering options

 	*
Natural language queries

 	*
Efficient data visualization tools

Developers can now streamline their workflow and focus on improving
model accuracy with this vision-centric solution.

		 GET STARTED [6] 

_partner with us [17]_

TRENDING SIGNALS

AI Agent

GITHUB REPO GOES VIRAL THAT IMPLEMENTS AI BOT APPLYING TO 1000 JOBS IN
24H, GETTING 50 INTERVIEWS [7]

⇧ 6,500 Likes

LLM

ABACUSAI RELEASES DRACARYS 2, AN OPEN-SOURCE CODING MODEL
OUTPERFORMING CLAUDE 3.5 SONNET ON LIVECODEBENCH [8]

⇧ 1,400 Likes

LLM

RESEARCHERS UNVEIL PROMPTING TECHNIQUE BOOSTING CLAUDE 3.5 SONNET TO
MATCH O1 MODELS ON COMPLEX REASONING [9]

⇧ 2,872 Likes

Anthropic

ANTHROPIC INTRODUCES AUTOMATIC ARTIFACT ERROR FIXING IN CLAUDE,
STREAMLINING WORKFLOW FOR AI DEVELOPERS [10]

⇧ 1,401 Likes

Transformer

NEW RESEARCH SHOWS SIMPLIFIED RNNS RIVALING TRANSFORMERS WITH 2.5X
FEWER TRAINING STEPS [11]

⇧ 3,363 Likes

IMPROVE LLM PERFORMANCE WITH FIDDLER TRUST SERVICE LLM SCORING

Fiddler's new Trust Service is now 1.5x faster, 6x cheaper, and 50%
more accurate on public benchmarks.

It uses proprietary models to monitor groundedness, quality, and
safety metrics, pinpointing root causes. Developers can test it
through an interactive demo just released.

WATCH NOW [12]

TOP TUTORIALS

Web scraping

FIRECRAWL: OPEN-SOURCE WEB CRAWLER FOR LLM-READY DATA EXTRACTION [13]

⇧ 3,330 Likes

Discover Firecrawl, an open-source tool for web crawling and data
extraction. You'll learn to turn websites into LLM-ready markdown or
structured data. Firecrawl handles crawling, bot protections, and
proxies. It runs headless browsers at scale. The API is self-hostable.
You'll get clean, formatted data from all accessible subpages without
needing a sitemap. Firecrawl solves web scraping edge cases for you.

Gen AI

LEARN TO BUILD GENERATIVE AI APPS WITH MICROSOFT'S FREE, COMPREHENSIVE
COURSE [14]

⇧ 3,200 Likes

Microsoft's Generative AI course teaches you to build AI applications
from scratch. You'll learn about large language models, prompt
engineering, and responsible AI development. The course covers text
generation, chat systems, search, and image creation. You'll work with
Python, TypeScript, Azure OpenAI, and OpenAI API. It includes hands-on
coding exercises and advanced topics like RAG, AI agents, and
fine-tuning. This free, comprehensive course helps you master
generative AI application development.

Llama 3.2

UNDERSTAND HOW THE ARCHITECTURES LOOK LIKE UNDER THE HOOD OF LLAMA 3.2
[15]

⇧ 7,700 Likes

This tutorial shows you how to implement Llama 3.2 from scratch in
Python. You'll learn the architecture details of Llama 3.2 1B and 3B
models. The guide covers grouped-query attention, rotary position
embeddings, and RMSNorm. You'll see how to load pretrained weights and
use the model for text generation. This hands-on approach helps you
understand large language models deeply.

HOW TO

RAG

LEARN TO CREATE OPTIMAL PRODUCTION-READY RAG SETUP FOR YOUR DATA
AUTOMATICALLY WITH RAGBUILDER

⇧ 789 Likes

RagBuilder is a toolkit for creating optimized Retrieval-Augmented
Generation (RAG) setups automatically. It performs hyperparameter
tuning on various RAG parameters like chunking strategy and size,
embedding models, and retriever types.

RagBuilder evaluates these configurations against a test dataset to
find the best-performing setup for your data. It includes pre-defined
RAG templates that have shown strong performance across diverse
datasets. 

YOU'LL LEARN:

Hyperparameter tuning for RAG
Using pre-defined RAG templates
Generating synthetic test data
Evaluating RAG configurations
Implementing document parsing with LlamaParse
Setting up environment variables for various services
Using different embedding models and retriever types
Optimizing chunk sizes and strategies
Integrating with vector databases

STEP-BY-STEP FOR HIGH-ACCURACY RAG ON PDFS OR TEXT FILES:

 	*
Install RagBuilder using the provided installation script or Docker
image.

 	*
Set up necessary environment variables in a .env file.

 	*
Start RagBuilder and access the dashboard.

 	*
Create a new project, specifying your use case (e.g., scientific
literature Q&A).

 	*
Input your source data (PDF or text files).

 	*
Select RAG options, focusing on parameters suitable for scientific
literature.

 	*
Choose Bayesian optimization for efficient hyperparameter tuning.

 	*
Generate or provide a test dataset.

 	*
Run the optimization process.

 	*
Review results and select the best-performing configuration.

 	*
Implement the chosen RAG setup using the provided code snippet.

 	*
Fine-tune the system with domain-specific feedback if needed.

		 READ MORE [16] 

HOW WAS TODAY’S EMAIL?

NOT GREAT   GOOD    AMAZING

THANK YOU.

Looking to promote your company, product, service, or event to
200,000+ AI developers? Let's work together.

		 ADVERTISE [2]

Subject: Act now to upgrade your upcoming Amtrak trip
24 Hour Reminder ⏰ - Discover LakeheadU Webinar
Message: Email from Lakehead University International Save your seat at our upcoming live webinar and learn about Lakehead University   Hi Ayush! We're less than 24 hours away from our live Discover LakeheadU webinar! Learn more or save your spot by registering below.     Discover LakeheadU Tuesday, October 8, 2024 9:00 - 10:00 AM in Eastern Time (Canada) (view in your time zone)﻿   Learn More & Register   Lakehead University is celebrated as one of Canada's leading academic institutions with a comprehensive range of programs. Join us during this live webinar, where you will learn about our beautiful campuses in Thunder Bay and Orillia, the scenic and vibrant communities where they’re located, our 85+ degree programs, and dynamic student life. Learn about the Lakehead difference and why students from over 80 nations choose the #1 university in North America with under 10,000 students (Times Higher Education Global Impact Rankings 2024). Our recruitment team will be leading the presentation and hosting a live question & answer period. Register today!     Looking forward to connecting with you Jordan Ball International New & Social Media Officer Lakehead University - International Enrolment   Explore Lakehead's 85+ undergraduate and graduate programs Visit our Website             Lakehead University - International Enrolment | 955 Oliver Road | Thunder Bay, ON P7B 5E1 CA Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

Subject: 📅 IBM's Latest GenAI/Technical Conference
Message:
IBM TechXchange is a four-day conference designed to advance technical
skills and explore the latest innovations in technology. 

SIGNUP [1]  |  ADVERTISE [2]  |  FOLLOW ON X [3]  |  READ
ON WEB [4]

ALPHASIGNAL

 . 

HEY ,

Welcome to today's edition of AlphaSignal, a newsletter for developers
by developers.

IBM’S LARGEST TECHNICAL LEARNING EVENT: TECHXCHANGE CONFERENCE

AlphaSignal has teamed up with IBM to provide readers an exclusive 35%
discount for the IBM TechXchange Conference.

ABOUT IBM TECHXCHANGE

IBM TechXchange is a four-day conference designed to advance technical
skills and explore the latest innovations in technology. The event
features over 1,500 sessions and labs across 13 technology tracks,
catering to professionals focused on artificial intelligence, machine
learning, cloud architecture, data science, quantum computing, and
cybersecurity.

The conference emphasizes hands-on learning, technical workshops, and
networking opportunities with industry leaders.

WHERE: Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas

WHEN: October 21-24, 2024
35% DISCOUNT CODE: AlphaSignal

WHY YOU SHOULD ATTEND

 	*
EXCLUSIVE ACCESS TO EXPERTS: Interact directly with IBM’s
developers, engineers, and researchers. Gain insights from the
creators of cutting-edge technologies and receive personalized
feedback on your projects.

 	*
CUSTOMIZABLE LEARNING EXPERIENCE: Choose from a variety of technology
tracks that align with your interests and career goals. Whether
you’re looking to enhance your Kubernetes orchestration skills,
optimize machine learning pipelines, or delve into quantum computing,
the conference allows you to tailor your agenda accordingly.

 	*
HANDS-ON LABS AND CERTIFICATIONS: Participate in interactive labs to
work with the latest tools and technologies. These sessions provide
practical experience that you can apply immediately to your work.
Additionally, earn certifications that validate your expertise and
enhance your professional credentials.

		 REGISTER [5] 

WHAT YOU WILL LEARN

IBM TechXchange is structured to provide comprehensive learning
opportunities:

 	*
TECHNICAL WORKSHOPS: Engage in detailed workshops covering specific
technologies and methodologies. Topics include AI model optimization,
scalable cloud solutions, and advanced data analytics techniques.

 	*
BREAKOUT SESSIONS: Attend focused discussions on niche subjects,
facilitating in-depth exploration and collaborative problem-solving.
These sessions enable knowledge sharing and exposure to specialized
areas within your field.

 	*
CERTIFICATIONS: Obtain recognized certifications that demonstrate your
proficiency in key technologies. These credentials can open doors to
new career opportunities and advancements.

CONFERENCE AGENDA HIGHLIGHTS

The agenda is meticulously planned to maximize your experience:

	*
MONDAY, OCTOBER 21: COMMUNITY DAY

 	* Registration and Volunteer Hub open early.
 	* Breakfast and networking sessions.
 	* Labs and certification testing.
 	* Evening opening night block party at Sandbox 2.0.

	*
TUESDAY, OCTOBER 22: TECHNOLOGY BREAKOUTS

 	* Opening kickoff with Dinesh Nirmal.
 	* Track spotlights and technology breakouts.
 	* Networking events and Beachbox Poolside Party in the evening.

	*
WEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 23: COLLABORATIVE CODING

 	* Hack-a-thon celebration.
 	* Continued technology breakouts and track spotlights.
 	* Pizza & Beer Night at Sandbox 2.0 for relaxed networking.

	*
THURSDAY, OCTOBER 24: CLOSING CEREMONIES

 	* Final technology breakouts and labs.
 	* Closing ceremony with awards and the Fuel Up event.

Beyond sessions and workshops, IBM TechXchange includes several
additional features to enhance your experience:

 	*
NETWORKING OPPORTUNITIES: Connect with over 7,000 technical peers and
industry leaders. Build relationships that can lead to future
collaborations and career advancements.

 	*
CODE SPRINTS AND HACKATHONS: Participate in events that foster
creativity and teamwork. Contribute to open-source projects and
develop new solutions alongside other professionals.

 	*
EXCLUSIVE GIVEAWAYS: Receive practical tools such as coding software,
trial licenses, and previews of upcoming IBM technologies. These
resources support your ongoing projects and enhance productivity.

REGISTRATION AND DISCOUNT DETAILS

Early registration is recommended to secure your spot and benefit from
the reduced rate.

WHERE: Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas

WHEN: October 21-24, 2024
35% DISCOUNT CODE: AlphaSignal

		 REGISTER [5] 

HOW WAS TODAY’S EMAIL?

NOT GREAT   GOOD    AMAZING

THANK YOU.

Looking to promote your company, product, service, or event to
200,000+ AI developers? Let's work together.

		 ADVERTISE [2] 

Stop receiving emails here [6]

214 Barton Springs Rd, Austin, Texas, 78704, United States of America

 

Links:
------
[1] https://link.alphasignal.ai/HWyWVm
[2] https://link.alphasignal.ai/qBDJtP
[3] https://link.alphasignal.ai/uIKFtp

From: "Glisery, Director of Graduate Admission, Bentley University" <applygrad@bentley.edu>
Subject: Discover Your Path to Success at Bentley
Message:
Hi Ayush,

                        I'm so pleased that you are interested in the Bentley MS in Business Analytics. As the Director of Graduate Admission, I wanted to share with you why Bentley is a great place to take the next step in your career.

                        At Bentley, to be a force is to make a difference, big or small. It's about accountability, recognizing the need for positive change and acting on it. It's about understanding others, challenging the status quo and making a positive impact that moves business forward, and us all forward. For over 100 years, Bentley has been preparing the next generation of business leaders. With a Bentley education, you'll be ready to advance your career and successfully meet today's most pressing challenges.

                        Over the next several weeks, be on the lookout for additional information regarding the McCallum Graduate School of Business. You've embarked on a journey that will change your life. Congratulations on taking the first step!                      


BEGIN APPLICATION <https://www.bentley.edu/graduate/apply>

                        Sincerely,

                        Glisery Colón
                        Director of Graduate Admission

                        Bentley University
                        McCallum Graduate School of Business
                        175 Forest Street | Waltham, MA 02452
www.bentley.edu/graduate


 


This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com by Glisery, Director of Graduate Admission, Bentley University.
Unsubscribe from Bentley University. <https://applygrad.bentley.edu/go?r=optout&mid=ab558bea-a0da-47a3-8811-fe23a401409b>

Message: Email from Lakehead University International You don't want to miss this.   Upcoming Live Webinars Join us this week on the Lakehead International Live series to learn more about... The Lakehead difference and why students from over 80 nations choose Lakehead University. Join us to hear more about our beautiful campuses, vibrant communities and dynamic student life. Don't miss these unique opportunities to connect with your support staff. Did you miss one of our previous webinars? Not to worry, we've got you covered - check out the recordings at the bottom of this email.     ﻿Discover LakeheadU Tuesday, October 8, 2024 9:00 - 10:00 AM in Eastern Time (Canada) (view in your time zone)﻿   Learn More & Register     Previous Live Events You'll find the full archive of Lakehead International Live webinar recordings on our YouTube channel.         Looking forward to connecting with you Jordan Ball International New & Social Media Officer Lakehead University - International Enrolment Explore Lakehead's 85+ undergraduate and graduate programs Visit our Website             Lakehead University - International Enrolment | 955 Oliver Road | Thunder Bay, ON P7B 5E1 CA Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

Subject: Sales Leader - Fast Track to Leadership
Message:
Hi Ayush,

At Globe Life we aim to inspire everyone in our network to help Make
Tomorrow Better. We believe that our continued success is driven by our
talented and passionate team. As we expand our operations, we are
looking for a dynamic Sales Leader to join us and help steer our sales
team towards even greater achievements.

In this role, you will:

-   Lead and mentor a team of high-performing sales professionals
-   Develop and implement innovative sales strategies
-   Collaborate with other departments to ensure seamless execution of
    our sales goals
-   Drive revenue growth and market expansion

We believe that your experience makes you a standout candidate for this
position. We would love the opportunity to discuss how your expertise
can contribute to our team and share more about what makes Globe Life a
great place to start your career at.
We look forward to hearing from you, please apply below:

Check out the opportunities below to apply:

-   Sales Leader – Fast Track to Leadership - NorCal, CO, TX

LOOKING FOR A NEW OPPORTUNITY? Click here to see all our open roles!

_Want to change how you receive these emails? Update your preferences
here_

Subject: ➡️Full-Tuition Scholarships Available Now
Competition Launch: Unlock Global Communication with Gemma
Message:
Kaggle








Hi ayush pokharel,

AI language translation is a strong example of where lightweight open  
models shine – there are over 7,000 languages, countless cultural nuances,  
and translations need to work quickly on smartphones.

Today, Google released a new Gemma 2 2b variant fine-tuned for Japanese  
with training materials as a learning resource. Their goal is to empower  
communities worldwide to adapt Gemma to their own languages, using their  
deep understanding of their languages and cultures.

To further support this effort, we've partnered with Google to launch the  
Unlocking Global Communication with Gemma competition. Participants are  
invited to fine-tune Gemma 2 for different languages and share their  
knowledge through reproducible notebooks that explore elements like  
language fluency, literary traditions, historical texts, and more.





Total Prizes:

$150,000


Entry Deadline:

January 14, 2025




Learn More



Your work will help unlock the full potential of language AI and create a  
more connected and understanding world.

Good luck,

Addison Howard
Kaggle Competitions



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com because you indicated that  
you'd like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want to  
receive these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can also  
change your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in at  
kaggle.com.

Dear Ayush,

In our next free Learn With The Nerds live event, you will learn to build a data model in Power BI!

Everything in Power BI is more complicated if you don’t build a good data model. Business Intelligence consultants spend an entire career learning how to build data models, but NOT you! Understanding the fundamentals of dimensional modeling (Star Schema) can get you very far in Power BI.

What you’ll learn:

✔️What is a Star Schema?

✔️Building Facts and Dimensions

✔️Understanding Relationships

✔️Role-Playing tables

✔️Understanding Storage Modes

✔️Direct Lake with Fabric

Speaker - Mitchell Pearson

Mitchell Pearson has been with Pragmatic Works for 11 years as a Data Platform Consultant, Trainer and Team Lead. Mitchell has authored books on SQL Server, Power BI and the Power Platform. We hope you are enjoying our trainers, their teaching style, and all the content we have on our YouTube Channel.

Our goal by reaching out is to learn more about your current training goals, challenges, and priorities to see how we can help. Pragmatic Works has designed an Enablement Program that pledges successful adoption of technology through a "teach you to fish" methodology.

We invite you to schedule a short meeting to discuss your Training initiatives and goals. Subject: Our new MS in Complex Network Analysis is here
Message:
Northeastern's cutting-edge program lets you lead in a connected world.

View in browser <https://enroll.northeastern.edu/go?cmd=message&id=438e70c9-cf32-46de-b417-935e6602414e>
                              Northeastern University                            


Master of Science in Complex Network Analysis


                              Hello Ayush,                            

                              All industries are looking for professionals with next-level skills to help their organizations thrive in an interconnected world. Northeastern's new Master of Science in Complex Network Analysis is one of the first degree programs in the country to focus on developing the next generation of leaders.  The program is tied to the rapid growth of informatics, research, and network analysis, which are central to this emerging field.                            


Apply now <https://enroll.northeastern.edu/apply/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_campaign=em-cvn-evg-glo-grad-net-stem-mscna-emb-2024_09_30-gtm_launch>
The curriculum puts you at the forefront of the interconnected systems that influence every aspect of our lives—where we get our news and who we share ideas with, how we travel and the people we interact with, the products we purchase, and the foods we eat. You'll learn how the structure and dynamics of networks can help solve the world's greatest challenges, including pandemics, food scarcity, cultural polarization, and climate change. 

                              You'll gain the conceptual and analytical tools needed to find patterns of networked connections within real-world settings. The curriculum includes three industry-aligned concentrations to help you apply your degree in the sector that best meets your interests and needs. Upon applying, you'll choose a concentration in complex social systems <https://graduate.northeastern.edu/program/master-of-science-in-complex-network-analysis-complex-social-systems-19473/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_campaign=em-cvn-evg-glo-grad-net-stem-mscna-emb-2024_09_30-gtm_launch>, economic and technological networks <https://graduate.northeastern.edu/program/master-of-science-in-complex-network-analysis-economic-and-technological-networks-19472/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_campaign=em-cvn-evg-glo-grad-net-stem-mscna-emb-2024_09_30-gtm_launch>, or population health dynamics <https://graduate.northeastern.edu/program/master-of-science-in-complex-network-analysis-population-health-dynamics-19469/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_campaign=em-cvn-evg-glo-grad-net-stem-mscna-emb-2024_09_30-gtm_launch>.                             

                              For spring 2025 admission, applications must be received by December 1 for domestic students and by November 1 for international students. If you're ready to take the next step, submit your application <https://enroll.northeastern.edu/apply/?utm_medium=email&utm_source=slate&utm_campaign=em-cvn-evg-glo-grad-net-stem-mscna-emb-2024_09_30-gtm_launch> today. Please do not hesitate to contact us at enroll@northeastern.edu if you have any questions about the program or want to discuss the application process. 

                              Sincerely,

                              Graduate Admissions
                              Northeastern University                            




Arlington <https://arlington.northeastern.edu>   Boston <https://www.northeastern.edu>   Charlotte <https://www.northeastern.edu/charlotte>    London <https://www.nchlondon.ac.uk>    Miami <https://miami.northeastern.edu/>    Oakland <https://oakland.northeastern.edu>   Portland ME <https://roux.northeastern.edu>   Silicon Valley <https://www.northeastern.edu/bayarea>   Seattle <https://www.northeastern.edu/seattle>   Toronto <https://www.northeastern.edu/toronto>   Vancouver <https://www.northeastern.edu/vancouver>


360 Huntington Ave., Boston, MA 02115-9959

All of them can be built on top of 3rd party tools

Subject: Account debit and credit txn  alert
📅 [Invitation] Google Cloud App Dev & Infrastructure Summit
Message:
Kaggle








Hi ayush pokharel,

We're going to Google Cloud's App Dev & Infrastructure Summit, and would  
love to see you there! This no-cost digital event features real-world  
strategies for app modernization, cloud compliance, and leveraging AI.

It'll take place across three time zones on three different dates: Americas  
on Oct 30th, EMEA on Oct 31st, and APAC on Dec 5th (APAC registration page  
coming soon).





Americas Summit Registration



EMEA Summit Registration



Nate Keating, Head of Product at Kaggle, will present "How to fine-tune AI  
models using Google Cloud and Kaggle." He'll cover how to extend open Gemma  
models using GKE and Cloud GPUs, and how to access open models and datasets  
on Kaggle to build AI solutions quickly.

See you there,

The Kaggle Team



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com because you indicated that  
you'd like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want to  
receive these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can also  
change your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in at  
kaggle.com.

Subject: [Product Announcement] Awards and Badges on Kaggle
Message:
Kaggle








Hi ayush pokharel,

We're excited to announce two new types of achievements you can earn on  
Kaggle – Awards and Badges. There are already 28 Awards and 54 Badges on  
the platform, and we'll continue adding new ones over time. Check out your  
profile to see what Awards and Badges you have today!





View your Profile



What are Awards and Badges?

Awards: Awards are a new way for us to acknowledge all of the awesome work  
Kagglers achieve outside of the progression system like winning an  
analytics competitions, hosting a competition, speaking at a special Kaggle  
event, and making it to the top of the competition rankings. Here's the  
full list of all 28 Awards we have at launch. A list of all 28 awards we  
have at launch.

Badges: Badges are focussed on lightweight fun. You can earn Badges for  
trying out different features across Kaggle and for your activity across  
the site. Here's the full list of all 54 Badges we have at launch.

A list of all 54 badges we have at launch.

We hope these new achievements better recognize all the amazing types of  
contributions the community is making on Kaggle and empower you to  
customize your Kaggle profile into an excellent résumé and portfolio. As  
always we welcome your feedback and ideas as we go forward.

Happy badge hunting!

The Kaggle Team



Kaggle, Inc 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043

This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com because you indicated that  
you'd like to receive news and updates about Kaggle. If you don't want to  
receive these emails in the future, please unsubscribe here. You can also  
change your preferences on your account's profile page by logging in at  
kaggle.com.

Subject: New jobs posted from Compass Group
More new and updated programs from IBM Skills Network on Coursera!
Message:
Dear ayush pokharel,


The IBM Skills Network team has recently been busy at work developing and 
releasing the following:


      * IBM Program Manager Professional Certificate


      * Generative AI Engineering with LLMs Specialization


      * BI Analyst


In addition to these exciting new programs, another Coursera article 
featuring an IBMer has been released! Read this article to follow Isaak 
Ke’s path to becoming an AI Engineer where he helps build generative AI 
systems with foundation models. Learn about the day in the life of an AI 
Engineer as well as the road Isaak took to enter the field in the article 
Becoming an AI Engineer: 7 Questions with an IBMer
<https://eventing.coursera..wcA4DMoHqYvl8IAh0Tf6Rlp0VjPXfpL470Mj1Ce0vjM> 
.


IBM Skills Network aims to offer meaningful learning opportunities that 
assist you in reaching your career goals. We hope everyone discovers a 
program that captures their interest in the range of IBM Skills Network 
programs and courses available on Coursera
<https://eventing.coursera..rTd4s__FG5JuCefRZR9PpUSy9tG2XrmqxZWdevvhWwA> 
.


Unlock Your Program Management Potential with the IBM Program Manager 
Professional Certificate on Coursera


According to Glassdoor, the average salary for a Program Manager in the US 
is $120,000. With the IBM Program Manager Professional Certificate
<https://eventing.coursera..WLdHxxFlnRah7E7woqN8elDmUbDrnIUuXuV8yg1tMRk> 
, you’ll gain the skills and confidence to pursue these high-paying roles. 
In just 3-4 months, this comprehensive online program prepares you to 
become job-ready, with the skills and certification needed to stand out in 
a competitive job market.


The IBM Program Manager Professional Certificate offers a robust curriculum 
designed to equip you with the essential skills required in this dynamic 
field including the lifecycle of program management, strategic planning and 
execution. You will also learn the art of stakeholder engagement and 
governance, ensuring all parties are aligned with your program’s goals. In 
addition, with targeted content and practice exams the program will help 
you get ready for the Program Management Professional (PMI-PgMP) 
certification exam offered by the Project Management Institute (PMI).


Whether you are a seasoned professional in roles such as project manager, 
product owner, or scrum master, or you are just starting your career in 
program management, this program is designed for you.


Enroll in the IBM Program Manager Professional Certificate
<https://eventing.coursera..WLdHxxFlnRah7E7woqN8elDmUbDrnIUuXuV8yg1tMRk> 
today to accelerate your career!


Boost Your Generative AI potential with the Generative AI Engineering with 
LMMs Specialization by IBM


In today's rapidly evolving tech landscape, keeping pace with advancements 
in AI and machine learning is essential for professionals seeking to grow 
their expertise. The Generative AI Engineering with LMMs Specialization
<https://eventing.coursera..S6kqfRTM-WHWDeyIn2bx9TCgCbcATQ_YwbBe4yDHJRA> 
by IBM on Coursera offers a fast-track route for those aspiring to master 
Large Language Models (LLMs) and Generative AI (GenAI) technologies in just 
3 months. Whether you're an aspiring data scientist or a seasoned AI 
developer, this specialization equips you with job-ready skills to leverage 
cutting-edge AI frameworks, optimize models, and build natural language 
processing (NLP)-based applications.


Employers today are on the lookout for professionals with skills in LLMs, 
NLP, and AI development to build systems that can effectively understand 
and process human language. This is one of the most in-demand areas of AI 
development. By completing the practical and hands-on activities in this 
specialization, you will gain deep knowledge and expertise in Generative AI 
Architecture, LLMs, NLP Model Fine-Tuning, Hugging Face Transformers, 
PyTorch, and much more!


Enroll in the Generative AI Engineering with LMMs Specialization
<https://eventing.coursera..S6kqfRTM-WHWDeyIn2bx9TCgCbcATQ_YwbBe4yDHJRA> 
today to equip yourself with the latest AI skills!


Grow Your Skills with Generative AI for Business Intelligence (BI) 
Analysts: A Specialization from IBM on Coursera


Staying ahead of the digital curve is vital for career growth—especially in 
BI. Generative AI has revolutionized data analytics by providing 
capabilities to automate processes, generate insights, and deliver more 
accurate data-driven decisions. By integrating this technology into the BI 
lifecycle, analysts can supercharge their workflow, enhance their data 
analysis, and create impactful visualizations that drive business value.


If you’re a BI analyst—or aspiring to become one—the Generative AI for 
Business Intelligence (BI) Analysts Specialization
<https://eventing.coursera..sSvp3_iaeFukDfkPgjHSZNBPQtpXn0eYNaF-JyzeXl4> 
from IBM offers a timely and strategic learning pathway. This 
specialization is designed to give professionals the skills they need to 
harness generative AI’s potential in BI. 


Ready to unlock the potential of generative AI in your BI career? Enroll in 
the Generative AI for Business Intelligence Analysts Specialization
<https://eventing.coursera..sSvp3_iaeFukDfkPgjHSZNBPQtpXn0eYNaF-JyzeXl4> 
today.  For a limited time, you’ll get the first month of learning 
absolutely free
<https://eventing.coursera..v0NJS6nDFWokkuKoVkXZV3mtM18MezTLsu0j24_n4jY> 
!

The Tau Beta Pi Association, Inc. shared a post: Book an appointment today to ensure your spot in front of corporate and graduate school recruiters at Tau Beta Pi’s Virtual Recruiting Fair on October 10 from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. ET! The booking window will be open through October 10, but appointments are first come, first served.

Visit our website to learn how to browse recruiters, book appointments, and curate your profile: https://lnkd.in/e3K4-kJa.

Datadog shared a post: 10월 24일 오후 2시, Korea DPN Live Briefing을 온라인으로 진행합니다. 올해는 데이터독 한국 파트너분들만을 위하여 처음으로 한국어로 진행합니다. 이번 웨비나에서는 Datadog Partner Network의 새로운 프로그램 및 새로운 제품에 대해서 업데이트 드릴 예정입니다. 지금 바로 등록하세요!  https://lnkd.in/eUAeKyTY

Subject: We've saved your Paperless Settings
24 Hour Reminder ⏰ - Discover LakeheadU Webinar
Message: Save your seat at our upcoming live webinar and learn about Lakehead University   Hi Ayush! We're less than 24 hours away from our live Discover LakeheadU webinar! Learn more or save your spot by registering below.     Discover LakeheadU Tuesday, October 1, 2024 9:00 - 10:00 AM in Eastern Time (Canada) (view in your time zone)﻿   Learn More & Register   Lakehead University is celebrated as one of Canada's leading academic institutions with a comprehensive range of programs. Join us during this live webinar, where you will learn about our beautiful campuses in Thunder Bay and Orillia, the scenic and vibrant communities where they’re located, our 85+ degree programs, and dynamic student life. Learn about the Lakehead difference and why students from over 80 nations choose the #1 university in North America with under 10,000 students (Times Higher Education Global Impact Rankings 2024). Our recruitment team will be leading the presentation and hosting a live question & answer period. Register today!     Looking forward to connecting with you Jordan Ball International New & Social Media Officer Lakehead University - International Enrolment   Explore Lakehead's 85+ undergraduate and graduate programs Visit our Website             Lakehead University - International Enrolment | 955 Oliver Road | Thunder Bay, ON P7B 5E1 CA Unsubscribe | Update Profile | Constant Contact Data Notice

Subject: Apply now and receive an Application Fee Waiver!
Message:
Greetings Ayush,

We're happy to inform you that the Graduate Admissions office at Stevens Institute of Technology will be offering a waiver of the $60 Application Fee!

To take advantage of this offer, create and submit an application for the Spring 2025 Semester between Monday, September 30 to Friday, October 04 no later than 11:59 PM, EDT.

Begin or Manage Your Application <http://gradadmissions.stevens.edu/apply>
Once completed, submit your application without paying the fee; there is no code required. We will process and apply the waiver within 2 business days of your submission!

                        For those who may need additional time to prepare materials, please submit within the fee waiver period noted above; you will be able to upload additional materials to complete the application through your application status page after submission. Any application fee payments made before or during this time period cannot be refunded.

                        *This offer is valid for Spring 2025 applications submitted between the aforementioned dates only and is not applicable for PhD applications.*

                        Best wishes,

Dina Iskaros
                            Director
                            Graduate Admissions
                            T 1 201 216 5319
                            F 1 888 511 1306


Stevens Institute of Technology
                        1 Castle Point Terrace
                        Hoboken, NJ 07030
stevens.edu

                        1-888-STEVENS | graduate@stevens.edu





This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com by Stevens Institute of Technology.
Unsubscribe from Stevens Institute of Technology. <https://gradadmissions.stevens.edu/go?r=optout&mid=aea0e475-67e2-4427-85bc-0c010e49a30c>

From: Bentley University Office of Graduate Admission <applygrad@bentley.edu>
Subject: Submit your Bentley graduate application for Spring 2025 and start in January!
Message:
Hi Ayush,

                        Discover the advantages of submitting your Bentley Graduate School Spring application by the Priority deadline of October 1.

Fast-Track Your Masters Degree: Don't wait until Fall 2025! Be the first in line to kickstart your MBA or Master's degree <https://www.bentley.edu/academics/graduate-programs> in January 2025. Early submission means a head start to completing your graduate program and fast tracking your career.

Scholarship Consideration: Gain priority review for merit-based scholarships <https://www.bentley.edu/graduate/scholarships> that can lighten your financial commitment and support your educational journey. Both international and domestic applicants are considered.

International Students - Be Proactive About Your Student Visa: Rest easy knowing that you'll have enough time to apply for an F-1 visa, ensuring a smooth transition to graduate school.

Financial Aid Support: Apply for student grants and loans <https://www.bentley.edu/graduate/scholarships#grants> or explore various financial aid options <https://bentleydownloads.s3.amazonaws.com/financial-assistance/FA.926.23+Grad+Financial+Aid+23.24_02b+(1).pdf> to secure the necessary funding to make your educational dreams a reality.

                        Select the Spring 2025 term on your BusinessCAS application portal. Use the discount code PRIORITY and save $75 on application fee. 

How to use the code: In the BusinessCAS application select the Program Materials section, enter the discount code and reduce your application fee from $133 to only $58!    

Please note that this discount only works for your Bentley Graduate application, if you are applying to multiple schools on BusinessCAS your total cost may vary.                          


Begin Application <https://businesscas2024.liaisoncas.com/applicant-ux/#/login>

                        If you have questions about the application, connect with us: email applygrad@bentley.edu or call 781-891-2108.    

                        Sincerely, 

                        Glisery Colon  
                        Director, Graduate Admission                              


 


This email was sent to ayush.pokharel8@gmail.com by Bentley University Office of Graduate Admission.
Unsubscribe from Bentley University. <https://applygrad.bentley.edu/go?r=optout&mid=5fe7cdc5-17f3-4e75-a4fa-8afda069acb2>

Subject: Quick Changes to Make Your LinkedIn Profile More Visible to Recruiters
Message:
Try LinkedIn Optimization for Actionable Tips Customized to Your Job Search.

Hi ayush,

87% of recruiters use LinkedIn to fill jobs that aren’t even public yet. Jobscan’s LinkedIn Optimization tool (https://info.jobscan.co/e3t/Ctc/S+113/cvzDf04/VWLg6n1KXxVkW839wmT5--qtDW6J3_6X5lwt1KN8tN9CF3prCCW7lCdLW6lZ3lwW3sd3762lVyHVW7k1BZX5XMly3W5syR893ndNM7W4JtRHc539C7DW3QYYgJ76B0kwW4v5fmg6r_CM2W4l62_313FCDfM1mtLWfxFd6W5n6GLp3jhYLZW3nHGh6155TWJW7ZK5bl2xnynbW6TSNxK4HRVHTW3hfbp11x6ZWVW52C7_y84nX4FVLkpKm8cRhTgW3Sw1Qs4zgzLYW4C_YPN5m9ZGNV3pMV98yGkLdW3WCtvQ75mtn3W3T-RCd1mJJnfW89qQ0B8L2Cd-W68zwc32n0PFPV-lrfS63R7jtV-cNJZ2khv5mf3Yd7ZF04 ) will make your profile soar to the top of their search results.

TRY LINKEDIN OPTIMIZATION
(https://info.jobscan.co/e3t/Ctc/S+113/cvzDf04/VWLg6n1KXxVkW839wmT5--qtDW6J3_6X5lwt1KN8tN9CF3prCCW7lCdLW6lZ3lwW3sd3762lVyHVW7k1BZX5XMly3W5syR893ndNM7W4JtRHc539C7DW3QYYgJ76B0kwW4v5fmg6r_CM2W4l62_313FCDfM1mtLWfxFd6W5n6GLp3jhYLZW3nHGh6155TWJW7ZK5bl2xnynbW6TSNxK4HRVHTW3hfbp11x6ZWVW52C7_y84nX4FVLkpKm8cRhTgW3Sw1Qs4zgzLYW4C_YPN5m9ZGNV3pMV98yGkLdW3WCtvQ75mtn3W3T-RCd1mJJnfW89qQ0B8L2Cd-W68zwc32n0PFPV-lrfS63R7jtV-cNJZ2khv5mf3Yd7ZF04 )

We'll make sure your profile is easy to find and stands out from the competition.
